cpg.howToUse:
Visit nearest Absolute Barbecues (AB’s) restaurant, check store locator - https://www.absolutebarbecues.com/
Inform the service team that you would like to pay using Gift Card, share the Card no and pin details
Cashier in puts card details and submit it for validation
Once card gets validated, total invoice value will get reduced with redeemed value of the gift card
Balance amount (if any) must be paid using other mode of payment accepted at the outlet
Post clearance of the payment invoice gets closed

description: A unique 'do-it-yourself' dining experience where diners grill on the Table, their choice of Meat, Seafood and Vegetables starters served on skewers to their preference. A central live grill "Wish Grill" dishing out exotic varieties of veggies and game birds take the experience of dining to a whole new level
expiry: 365 days from the date of activation.
name: Absolute Barbecues E-Gift Card
shortDescription:
•    Gift card cannot be exchanged for cash.

•    subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent

•    Please contact the outlet manager for any acceptance issue

•    This is a ONE-time use Gift Card & Electronic Gift Cards can't be replaced or duplicated

tnc.content:
This is an Absolute Barbecues(AB's) Insta Gift Voucher (GV) / Gift Card (GC) and would be accepted at AB's outlets in India.
The person who has the AB's GV / GC Code is deemed to be the beneficiary.
Do inform the outlet reception that you plan to use the GV / GC for making payments before billing.
The validity period is 365 days from the date of its issuance or depends on the condition of the purchase.
A maximum of 5 GV / GC can be used in one bill.
This is a ONE time use GV / GC. Electronic Gift Vouchers can't be replaced or duplicated, if lost or stolen.
No Credit note / Refund for the unused amount of the GV / GC will be given.
AB's GV / GC CANNOT be revalidated once expired.
This E-Voucher cannot be exchanged for cash.
AB's GV / GC cannot be redeemed on specific block out dates. AB's may add or delete any date on its sole discretion.
Any dispute related to the GV / GC should be referred to the issuing company and the decision of the issuing company shall be final.
AB's makes full efforts to accept Insta Gift Vouchers (GV) / Gift Card (GC), but on account of any technical / administrative reasons an outlet may refuse to accept the same.
If an Insta Gift Voucher (GV) / Gift Card (GC) gets blocked on account of technical issue, it would get enabled in 72 hours.
Please contact outlet manager for any acceptance issue and if issue is still not resolved, you can write to wecare@absolute-barbecue.com
All disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts of Hyderabad, India.
Absolute Barbecues reserves the right to change the 'Terms & Conditions' at any time without prior information

cpg.howToUse:
ONLINE REDEMPTION-

  1. Customer should visit the American Eagle official website
  2. Login to your account or create new account
  3. Once logged-in, add the desired products to the cart.
  4. In the checkout page, under CHOOSE PAYMENT OPTION, select ‘My Gift Vouchers’
  5. Enter the card number, card pin and click on ‘Apply’
  6. Proceed with checkout

OFFLINE REDEMPTION-

  1. Customer visits American Eagle Store
  2. Customer completes shopping and proceeds to billing
  3. Customer presents e-gift card code (card no and Pin) to Cashier
  4. Cashier punches in bill

description: American Eagle Outfitters® (NYSE: AEO) is a leading global specialty retailer offering high-quality and on-trend clothing. We are an inclusive, optimistic and empowering company that celebrates the individuality of our customers and associates. Our purpose is to show the world that there’s REAL power in the optimism of youth.
expiry: 365 days from the date of issue
name: American Eagle E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
This E- Gift Card is redeemable on all merchandise at aeo.in and all exclusive American Eagle Outfitters stores across India
This E- Gift Card can be redeemed just once
The E-Gift Card is valid for one year from the date of purchase.
This E- Gift Card holds no value until activated with a minimum purchase.
There is no extra fee to obtain this card
Please present the print out of this E- Gift Card to the customer relationship officer prior to billing or when you want to redeem the card when shopping from stores
Please use the card number and PIN for the E-Gift Card when shopping online
This card is not redeemable for cash or credit.
In case of a damaged card, a new card will be issued and loaded with the remaining value only after proof and authenticity is presented to any AE store.
If a card is lost or stolen neither will a new card be issued nor will the money be reimbursed in any manner.

cpg.howToUse:
•    Visit www.euphoriajewellery.in

•    Select the required product and click on add to cart. Once complete with the shopping click on View Cart

•    Click on Qwikcilver Tab

•    Enter the Card Number, Pin and Amount

•    Respective amount will be deducted from the order value and the balance payable will be mentioned.

•    Click on proceed to checkout. Enter your Billing Details and click on place order.

description: A.Himanshu Jewelery Pvt. Ltd. was setup by the entrepreneurial initiatives by the managers of A.Himanshu & Co to go a stepfurther in servicing their diamond customers who wanted a tailor made end product rather than just the raw material. It’s a steptaken in the lines of supplying diamonds from the mines to the high street.Since its origin in 2004, A.Himanshu Jewelery Pvt.Ltd. has maintained a tradition of trust and service, leading the evolutionof the jewellery industry with unique energy and passion for the business.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Euphoria Gold Coin E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
This e-Gift card is activated once issued.
This e-Gift Card is valid for 1 year from the date of activation/issuance and it cannot be further re-validated.
This e-Gift card is valid on all products and can be redeemed online at www.euphoriajewellery.in only.
This e-Gift card is allowed for one-time redemption only.
Any unused balance on the e-Gift card will not be refunded or credited.
This e-Gift Card is non-encashable.
Bearer is responsible if an e-Gift Card is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission.
These terms & conditions are subject to change at any time, without any prior notice.
If the value of the purchase is less than the value of the Gift card, the balance is non-refundable.
Different Offers/vouchers cannot be combined.

cpg.howToUse:
Visit www.euphoriajewellery.in
Select the required product and click on add to cart. Once complete with the shopping click on View Cart
Click on Qwikcilver Tab
Enter the Card Number, Pin and Amount
Respective amount will be deducted from the order value and the balance payable will be mentioned.
Click on proceed to checkout. Enter your Billing Details and click on place order.

description: Euphoria Diamond Jewellery E-Gift Card is redeemable on euphoriajewellery.in and applicable on all Euphoria Diamond Jewellery products apart from gold and silver coins. We have an extensive collection of Lab Grown Diamond jewellery pieces, including rings, earrings, to choose from. The gift card can be redeemed at euphoriajewellery.in
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
message: Distribution Billing Discounts | products cannot be empty
name: Euphoria Diamond Jewellery E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
This e-Gift card is activated once issued.
This e-Gift Card is valid for 1 year from the date of activation/issuance and it cannot be further re-validated.
This e-Gift card is valid on all Gold Jewellery products and not on diamond jewellery and Gold/Silver coins. It can be redeemed online at www.euphoriajewellery.in only.

Any unused balance on the e-Gift card will not be refunded or credited.
This e-Gift Card is non-encashable.
Bearer is responsible if an e-Gift Card is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission.
These terms & conditions are subject to change at any time, without any prior notice.
If the value of the purchase is less than the value of the Gift card, the balance is non-refundable.
Different Offers/vouchers cannot be combined.
E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 - 48 hours.
No returns and no refunds on gift cards, e-gift cards and gift vouchers shipped by woohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

cpg.howToUse:
•    Select the flights you are interested in on the Air India website or Air India mobile app.

•    Enter the Gift Card number and pin after completing the purchase of a Gift Card.

•    If the booking amount equals or exceeds the available credit on the Gift Card, the Gift Card will be fully used until it has no remaining value.

•    If your Gift Card amount is lower than the booking amount, you can make up the difference by paying the additional amount using any credit card accepted by Air India on the Air India website or mobile app. Gift Card cannot be clubbed with any other form of payment if redemption is being done through the Air India Contact Centre.

description: Air India
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Air India E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
Air India is the issuer and redeeming entity for Gift Cards.
Gift Cards can be purchased only through the Platform. Gift Cards can be purchased and redeemed only in Indian currency (INR).
Gift Cards can be purchased using credit card or debit card.
Gift Cards are valid until the date mentioned on the Gift Cards. The validity of a Gift Card cannot be extended under any circumstances. You understand that you will not be compensated in any manner for any lapsed or unused amount under a Gift Card.
Gift Cards can be used to buy Air India tickets and ancillary products on the Air India website and mobile app and cannot be used to avail travel insurance, upgrades or any goods and/or services offered by any third party other than Air India.
Gift Cards are fully transferable but cannot be resold. Any unlawful resale or attempted resale is grounds for seizure and cancellation of the Gift Card without compensation.
You can purchase the Gift Card in any denomination between INR 1,000 and INR 2,00,000.
Gift Cards cannot be redeemed through any offline channel, such as airport ticketing centre.
Gift Cards cannot be redeemed for group travel.
Gift Cards are for individual use only. If travel agents are found purchasing or using the Gift Card, the booking will be cancelled, and no refund will be issued.
In case of a transaction failure, while making the payment through an Air India Gift Card, the amount will be automatically refunded to the same Gift Card balance within twenty-four (24) hours of failure of such transaction.
A Gift Card can be combined with any offer, such as a discount, cash back, or promotion, offered on Air India’s website, www.airindia.com.
Other modes of payment like credit cards can be used along with the redemption of the Gift Cards but limited to the Air India website and mobile app.
Gift Cards may be valid for both full and partial redemption depending on the Gift Card. Some Gift Cards can be redeemed only once, while others can be redeemed multiple times until the balance goes to zero. In case the value of the purchase exceeds the value of the Gift Card, the difference shall be paid by you. In case of partial redemption, the balance amount remains in the Gift Card until the validity period, which can be used for future transactions. No refunds or credit notes shall be issued for the unused part of the Gift Card.
Multiple Gift Cards (up to a maximum of three (3)) can be combined and used in a single transaction.
A Gift Card, once issued, cannot be refunded, cancelled, or exchanged for cash.
Air India will not be responsible if the Gift Card is used without permission and you are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of all details provided to you in relation to a Gift Card. You understand that we may choose to withdraw, amend, replace, extend, suspend, limit, or cancel any Gift Card at any time at our sole discretion, without any notice and liability to you.
You understand and acknowledge that while Air India issues Gift Cards to you, the issue of Gift Cards shall in no way mean, imply, or denote a promise or commitment for the assured provision of services or products.
To the fullest extent permitted under applicable law, the Gift Card, Platform and other related products, information, materials, and services provided by Air India are provided on an "as is" and “as available” basis. To the fullest extent permitted under applicable law, Air India disclaims all warranties of any kind, express or implied, arising out of the Platform and the use of the Gift Cards, including merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, and noninfringement, and all warranties arising from course of dealing, usage, or trade practice in respect to the same. Without limiting the foregoing, Air India makes no warranty of any kind that the Gift Cards, Platform, or any related products or results of the use thereof, will meet your or any other persons' requirements, operate without interruption, achieve any intended result, be compatible or work with any software, systems, or other services, be secure, accurate, complete, free of harmful code or error-free.
You acknowledge and agree that in the event a Gift Card is non-functional, your sole remedy will be the issuance of another Gift Card, for the value remaining in the non-functional Gift Card.
You agree and acknowledge that neither Air India nor any of its affiliates will be liable for any loss or damage that you or any third-party may suffer or incur which is suffered due to the use of a Gift Card in the event such loss or damage is not attributable to Air India, including but not limited to any loss or damage arising out of or due to: (a) your failure to maintain confidentiality of the details pertaining to a Gift Card or your account with Air India; (b) your failure to provide correct, complete or accurate information or data to avail the Gift Card; (c) your use or inability to use, or availability or unavailability of the Gift Card or the Platform, including any third party services; and (d) the occurrence or existence of any defect, interruption, or delays in the operation or transmission of information to, from, or through the Gift Card or the Platform, communication failure, theft, destruction, or unauthorised access to Air India’s records, programmes, services, servers, or other infrastructure relating to the Gift Card or the Platform.
In case of cancellation of purchase made using the Gift Card within the validity period, the amount deducted from the Gift Card will be reversed to the same Gift Card which was used at the time of making the respective purchase.
In case of cancellations where the Gift Card validity has already expired at the time of initiation of the cancellation process or at the time of processing a refund, no refund will be processed for the amount paid through the expired Gift Card.
In the event an amount is refunded to the Gift Card, users must save the Gift Card number and pin code to utilise this refunded amount under the Gift Card as Air India cannot reissue a new Gift Card number.
Air India reserves the right to modify these Gift Card Terms at its discretion. Such modifications will be updated by Air India on the Platform.
Air India reserves the right to deactivate, suspend, hold for review, cancel any Gift Card, or refuse to accept any Gift Card if it suspects that there is a duplicity of cards, the Gift Card was procured using fraudulent means, for any other violation of the Gift Card Terms or if so considered necessary by Air India in its sole discretion.
You shall indemnify, defend and hold Air India, its affiliates, and their officers, associates, successors, assigns, licensors, employees, directors, agents, and representatives, harmless from and against any direct or indirect losses, actions, damages, penalties, cost and expenses, claim, demand, lawsuits, a judicial proceeding, (including, without limitation, from all damages, liabilities, settlements, costs, and attorney's fees) arising from or relating to:
any act, commission or omission, error, misrepresentation, misconduct, negligence, fraud, forgery, dishonesty, violation attributable to you and/or your personnel/agents/representatives, or any third party who may use your account, your access to the Platform and use of the Gift Cards, and your use of the Platform and the Gift Cards in violation of these Gift Card Terms;
contravention of any applicable law; and
any claim from any authority or any third party as a result of any action or inaction on your part, including but not limited to a breach of these Gift Card Terms or any acts committed beyond the scope of these Gift Card Terms.
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, neither Air India nor any of its affiliates or related parties shall have any liability to you or any third party for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages or any loss of revenue or profits arising under, directly or indirectly, or relating, in any manner whatsoever, to these Gift Card Terms, including any action taken by any authority.
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary, Air India’s maximum aggregate liability to you under the Gift Card Terms or otherwise for any loss in connection with the Platform or the Gift Card shall be limited to the value of the Gift Card.
These Gift Card Terms shall be construed by and governed in accordance with the laws of India, and the courts of Delhi shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with them.
Any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with or relating to these Gift Card Terms or their breach, termination, or invalidity hereof shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration in Delhi in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996 for the time being in force, which rules are deemed to be incorporated by reference in this paragraph.
Within thirty (30) days of the issue of a notice of dispute, Air India and you shall mutually agree on the appointment of a sole arbitrator. If such mutual agreement is not arrived at within the aforesaid thirty (30) days period, Air India and you shall appoint such sole arbitrator in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996.
The seat of arbitration shall be Delhi and the arbitration proceedings shall be conducted in the English language.
Air India/You agree to keep the arbitration confidential and not disclose to any person, other than those necessary to the proceedings, any information, transcripts, or awards unless required by applicable law. The decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding on us/you hereto.
Air India/You hereto agree that our/your consent for the resolution of the dispute through arbitration shall not preclude or restrain you/us from seeking suitable injunctive relief in appropriate circumstances from courts in Delhi.
The cost of arbitration shall be borne in a manner by us/you as determined by the arbitrators. In the meantime, Air India/you shall bear Air India’s/your own cost for the arbitration which shall be reimbursed as per the directions in the arbitral award.
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary, nothing in these Gift Card Terms shall preclude any of your rights under applicable laws.
If you have any questions or complaints with regard to the Gift Card being offered or the Gift Card Terms, you may contact our call centre at 0116 932 9333, 0116 932 9999, 1860 233 1407.

tnc.content:
Issuer

  • This Ajio E- Gift Card (“E-Gift Card”) is powered by Pine Labs Private Limited (“Pine Labs”) a private limited company with its registered office at Delhi incorporated under the laws of India. The E-Gift Cards are issued for the purpose of used on the AJIO desktop website/mobile website/ mobile application (“AJIO Portal”) by the customers of the AJIO Portal.

Terms of use

  • The Holders (defined hereunder) agree that usage of the E-Gift Card is a voluntary exercise and they are not bound to accept any terms or conditions herein, unless they use or redeem the E-Gift Card.
  • The E-Gift Card:
    • cannot be used to purchase other gift cards.
    • cannot be redeemed for Cash or Credit and cannot be reloaded.
    • cannot be redeemed on the purchase of fine jewellery, silver and gold coins.

Terms of redemption

  • This E-Gift Card is redeemable only on the AJIO Portal.
  • The E-Gift Card once issued is valid for a total period of 12 months only from the date of issue
  • For the redemption of the E-Gift Card, every holder of E-Gift Card (“Holder”) shall be required to add the value stored on such E-Gift Card into the AJIO wallet account as AJIO Cash. The value of the gift card value to the AJIO Wallet account (AJIO Cash) is not transferable to any other account or to any bank account.
  • The loading of the E-Gift Card onto the user’s AJIO Wallet account shall constitute registration of the user on the AJIO Portal.
  • Once the E-Gift card is stored in the AJIO Wallet as AJIO cash it will have a total validity of 365 days for redemption on AJIO purchases
  • If the value of the products ordered (“Order Value”) is less than the total amount of the E-Gift Card, the outstanding balance (after deduction of order value) will reflect as AJIO cash in the AJIO Wallet account and can be used for subsequent transactions.
  • If the event that the Order Value exceeds the E-Gift Card amount, the balance must be paid by the Holder. The Holder acknowledges and agrees to pay any balance amount of the cost of the item being purchased, after the discount has been availed
  • All taxes, duties, levies or other statutory dues and charges payable in connection with the benefits accruing for the E-Gift Card, shall be borne solely by the Holder.
  • The Holder is solely responsible for the safety and security of the E -Gift Cards. AJIO Portal is not responsible for any acts of omission or commission if E-Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission.
  • All orders placed using the E-Gift Card are subject to availability of the products at the time of purchase and will be governed by the standard terms and conditions on the AJIO Portal. In case of return of the purchased item, please refer to the “Return Policy” on our website or contact AJIO customer care ( https://www.ajio.com/selfcare).
  • AJIO Portal assumes no responsibility for the products purchased using the E-Gift Card and any liability thereof is expressly disclaimed. Product warranty shall be regulated by the terms and conditions mentioned on the warranty card of respective products.
  • E-gift Voucher will not be applicable on H&M branded products.

    General Terms

    • There will be no extension of the E-Gift Card post the expiry of the validity date
    • The AJIO Portal reserves the unconditional right to cancel the E-Gift Card in the event the Holder breaches these terms of use of the E-Gift Card, and the terms and conditions of the AJIO Portal. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received after proper investigation
    • AJIO Portal reserves the right to change the terms and conditions of the E-Gift Card, including extending, withdrawing or discontinuing the same, at its sole discretion.
    • AJIO will not be liable for any loss (including, without limitation, direct, indirect, special or consequential loss or loss of profits) expense or damage which is suffered or sustained in connection with E-Gift Card including any loss incurred as a result of any delay and/or failure to perform any obligation to the Holder that is caused by:
      • technical problems of any kind which may limit or prevent any person's from redeeming the E-Gift Card
      • any loss or damage arising from or in connection with the allocation or enjoyment of discount;
      • any misuse of the E-Gift Card due to loss of any such confidential details.
      • any other events beyond the AJIO Portal’s control that may cause the promotion to be disrupted or corrupted or may lead to loss of, or damage to, the Holder.
    • The Holder hereby agrees to indemnify and keep the AJIO Portal harmless against all damages, liabilities, costs, expenses, claims, suits and proceedings that may be suffered by the AJIO Portal as a consequence of (i) violation of the terms and conditions by the Holder; (ii) violation of applicable laws; (iii) any action or inaction resulting in wilful misconduct or negligence on the User’s part.
    • User agrees that, these terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India and the courts at Mumbai, Maharashtra shall have exclusive jurisdiction to decide over any controversy arising out of this E-Gift Card
    • For dispute and liability with respect to the E-Gift Card, please refer the customer grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at support@woohoo.in
    • AJIO Portal may include links to third-party websites. In case any User of AJIO Portal is redirected to any third party website, User acknowledges that Reliance Retail Limited does not control such third-party website and assumes no responsibility for the content of such third-party website and any liabilities thereof is wholly disclaimed. Any information provided by User on such third-party website shall be governed by such third-party website Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. User access to or any other act on such third party website shall be entirely at User’s sole risk and responsibilities.

tnc.content:
Amazon Prime Voucher FAQs and TnC for tiering extension

Amazon Prime Voucher FAQs

  1. What is an Amazon Prime Voucher?
    An Amazon Prime Voucher is a prepaid payment instrument that can be used to purchase Amazon Prime memberships (3-months or 12-months or Prime Shopping edition) or Amazon Pay Anytime Gift cards (inactive zero value gift card) from Amazon. in. An Amazon Prime Voucher has an expiry of 12 months from the date of activation, subject to applicable terms. An Amazon Prime Voucher cannot be transferred or cancelled once it is issued (please reach out to the issuer (Pine Labs) for any assistance in this regard).
  2. How to use an Amazon Prime Voucher?
    A Prime voucher can be used to buy only 3- and 12-month Amazon Prime memberships or Prime Shopping edition or Amazon Anytime Gift cards on Amazon. When a voucher is eligible on an order (where all items in the cart are eligible for the specific voucher), Prime Vouchers will show up as a payment option in payment method selection page. To use 'Amazon Vouchers' for the purchase, select it on the payment method selection page. If the voucher value is not sufficient, you can pay the remaining balance using other payment options available on the payments page.
  3. I don't have enough Prime Voucher balance to pay fully for my Prime membership, can I use it with other forms of payment to complete my purchase?
    If the voucher value is not sufficient, you can pay the balance using other payment option available on the payments page on Amazon.
  4. Are existing Amazon Prime members also eligible for this offer?
    Existing Amazon Prime members can extend their Amazon Prime membership as per the Amazon Prime terms and conditions, by redeeming a Amazon Prime Voucher under the following conditions:
    1. Existing Amazon Prime members can only extend their Amazon Prime membership using Amazon Prime Voucher only once during their Amazon Prime membership tenure.
    2. Amazon Prime member who have availed Amazon Prime service through a Telecom plan (Airtel, VI, Jio etc.) are not eligible for this offer.
    3. Customer on low tiered plans like PVME, Prime Shopping edition can use it for upgrading to higher tiered plans. For e.g. PVME to Prime or Prime Shopping edition to Prime.
  5. I am on an Amazon Prime membership plan through my telecom operator, can I extend my Amazon Prime membership through Amazon Prime Voucher?
    Sorry. This is not applicable for customers who are Amazon Prime members through a Telecom operator.
  6. I have already added Amazon Prime Voucher to my Voucher Balance, but I am being asked to purchase Amazon Prime at a later date. Why?
    Existing Prime members can extend their Prime membership using their Prime Voucher unless they have already extended their Prime membership earlier. In this case they can add Prime Voucher to their Voucher Balance anytime, but will be allowed to extend their Prime membership only once their current Prime membership ends. Example: If the current Amazon Prime Membership expires on 28th May 2023, existing Amazon Prime member will be able to add the Amazon Prime voucher to their Voucher Balance anytime before 28th May 2023. But they will be able to use the voucher to purchase an extension on their Amazon Prime membership only after 28th May 2023.
  7. I already have INR 1499 balance in my Voucher Balance and not able to add more Amazon Prime Voucher. Why?
    Customers can add a maximum balance of INR 1499 (equivalent to price of a 12-month full Prime plan) to their Prime voucher balance. We request you to use the existing balance and become Prime member before adding more Prime Voucher to Voucher Balance.
  8. I am on Prime tiered plans like PVME, Prime Shopping edition, can I use Amazon Prime voucher to upgrade to higher tiered plans?
    Customer on low tiered plans like PVME, Prime Shopping edition can use Amazon Prime voucher for upgrading to higher tiered plans. For e.g. PVME to Prime or Prime Shopping edition to Prime. While doing Prime plan upgrade, Prime Vouchers will show up as a payment option in payment method selection page which you can select for making payment
  9. Why am I not being allowed to use my Prime Voucher balance while purchasing my Prime membership along with another product on Amazon?
    Amazon Prime Voucher is a prepaid payment instrument that can be used to purchase only Amazon Prime memberships or Amazon Anytime Gift cards from Amazon. Since Amazon Prime Vouchers are applied on the entire cart and not on individual items in the cart, you will not be allowed to use your Amazon Prime Voucher in a mixed item order, i.e. a cart which has at least one non-eligible item. You can however purchase an Amazon Prime membership (3 month or 12 month) with an Amazon Prime Voucher by visiting www.amazon.in/prime and selecting either 3 month or 12 month Amazon Prime membership.
  10. Can I cancel my Amazon Prime Membership?
    No, once Prime membership is activated via Amazon Prime voucher, it can't be cancelled and non-refundable.
  11. What happens at the end of my Amazon Prime membership period?
    At the end of the Prime membership, you will stop enjoying all Prime benefits. You may purchase any Amazon Prime membership plan directly from Amazon to continue enjoying all Prime benefits.
  12. What all types of Amazon Anytime Gift cards can be purchased using Prime voucher?
    All types of Amazon Anytime Gift cards are eligible for purchase via Prime voucher. Please refer to Anytime Gift cards store for more details.
  13. Can I use Prime voucher to load amount in Amazon Anytime Gift cards?
    Please note Amazon Anytime Gift Cards are physical cards/ empty inactive zero value instruments that can not be loaded using Prime voucher. However, you can load it using debit/credit cards, UPI, NB etc. after the purchase.
  14. Is refund allowed for cancelled/returned orders placed using Prime voucher?
    No, orders placed using Prime voucher as payment are not eligible for the refund.
  15. I lost my Amazon Prime Voucher / Amazon Prime Voucher not working - whom should I contact?
    Please contact your partner from whom you have received the Prime Voucher for help.
  16. How do I purchase Amazon Prime Voucher?
    Amazon Prime Voucher is currently only available via the Corporate Channel. Once available for retail sale, look out for a section for Prime Vouchers under Amazon Pay.

    Amazon Prime Voucher -Terms and Conditions

These terms and conditions apply to Amazon Prime Voucher issued by Pine Labs Private Limited (Pine Labs) under the brandname of Qwikcilver and co-branded with Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited ("Voucher").

  • The Amazon Prime Voucher is a prepaid payment instrument that can be used to purchase Amazon Prime memberships (3-month or 12-month memberships or Prime Shopping edition) or Amazon Pay Anytime Gift cards on Amazon in. The Amazon Prime Voucher has an expiry of 12 months from the date of activation, subject to applicable terms. An Amazon Prime Voucher cannot be transferred or cancelled once it is issued.
  • Credit and Debit Cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase Amazon Prime Voucher.
  • Beneficiary of the Amazon Prime Voucher can apply the 13-digit numeric code on https://www.amazon.in/vouchers and add the voucher balance in his/her Amazon.in account.
  • Amazon Prime Voucher must be used only towards the purchase of eligible products mentioned above, on Amazon.in only. The Voucher including any unused Amazon Prime Voucher balance, expire one year from the date of issuance of the voucher.

  • Pine Labs, Amazon or their affiliates are not responsible if a voucher is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission.

  • Can be used to purchase physical Amazon Pay Anytime Gift cards (inactive zero value gift card) from Amazon.in. Anytime Gift Cards are physical cards/ empty inactive zero value instruments that can be purchased by a customer and subsequently loaded using card, UPI, etc.. One of the most successful casual dining chains in India, Barbeque Nation pioneered the concept of live grills embedded under dining tables – allowing customers to grill their own barbecue’s right at their tables.
A novelty at the time, the restaurant allowed clients to customize their own starters with their preference of flavours – ushering the era of ‘Do It Yourself cuisine’ in India. The look and feel of all outlets is rustic and casual with wood and open-brick wall surface. Any balance remaining in the Gift Card will be carried over to next purchase
All Birkenstock India Gift Cards are valid for 1 year from the date of issue

Gift cards cannot be exchanged in the form of cash or monetary transfers

description: At Blackberrys, we embrace the rich cultural vastness of India. We understand the varied gifting needs and bring to you, a wide selection of stylishly & sharply designed collections. From crisp shirts to wrinkle-free trousers and from smart ethnic to sharp suits that fit impeccably, Blackberrys’ range of products is designed to fit in every occasion! We assure you are in the right place to choose the perfect gift. Generate Blackberrys gift cards to be given to your loved ones as the ideal gift & help them get what their heart desires.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Blackberry E-Gift Card
shortDescription:
•    Gift cards can be redeemed in-store.

•    Gift card is valid for one year from the date of issue.

•    Gift cards can be redeemed only once and in full, in case the value of the merchandise exceeds the value of the card, the difference shall be paid by the bearer.

•    This Gift Card cannot be transferred for balance value or redeemed for cash.

tnc.content:
Gift Cards are only redeemable at Blackberrys exclusive stores in India.
Gift card is not redeemable at www.blackberrys.com.
This Gift card is valid for one year from the date of issue.
This Gift card can be redeemed only once and in full, in case the value of the merchandise exceeds the value of card, the difference shall be paid by the bearer. No refunds / credit note shall be issued for unused part of the Gift card.
Gift Card carries no value until activated. This Gift Card shall be deemed active upon loading of fixed denominations of INR 500INR 1000, INR 2500, INR 5000, INR 7500 or INR 10,000. The maximum denomination per card is limited to INR 10,000.
Valid Gift Card in its original form (email) has to be presented at the time of availment at Blackberrys exclusive stores.
Gift Card is issued in Indian Rupees.
This Gift Card cannot be transferred for balance value or redeemed for cash.
Blackberrys reserves the right to amend the terms at its discretion without prior notice.
Protect the Gift card number to avoid misuse, Blackberrys shall neither replace the Gift card nor refund the cash.
Disputes if any, shall be subject to exclusive jurisdiction of Delhi.
No replacement/compensation is permissible for lost Gift card.
Reach out to customersupport@blackberrys.com for any queries.

cpg.howToUse:
Go to Blinkit App
Add items to Cart
Select Blinkit Money as Payment Method
Click on Claim Gift Card
Enter the 16 digit card number and 6 digit pin and tap on claim

OR

Click on Money icon
Click on Claim Gift Card banner
Enter the 16 digit card number and 6 digit pin and tap on claim

description: Blinkit is an Indian quick-commerce platform that specializes in delivering groceries, household essentials, fresh produce, and more directly to customers’ doorsteps. Known for its ultra-fast delivery service, often within minutes, Blinkit operates in 80+ cities across India. The app is user-friendly, offering an intuitive shopping experience with a wide range of products, including packaged goods, personal care items, and fresh fruits and vegetables. Blinkit has become a go-to platform for those looking for last-minute groceries or a hassle-free shopping experience.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Blinkit B2C E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
Blinkit gift cards (each a “Gift Card”) are issued by Pinelabs Limited, an entity incorporated in accordance with laws of India (“Pinelabs”) for your (“User”) use, , and Pinelabs is authorized by the Reserve Bank of India (“RBI”) under the Master Directions on Prepaid Payment Instruments (“PPI Master Directions”) to issue gift cards.

  1. By purchasing the Gift Card on the Blinkit Platform (as defined below), using or redeeming a Gift Card, the User is agreeing to accept and to be bound by these terms and conditions, as updated or modified from time to time (“Terms”).
  2. Gift Card redemptions are limited to ₹25,000, per User, per calendar month.
  3. The Gift Card bears a 16-digit electronic PPI number along with a 6-digit pin.
  4. The Gift Cards can be redeemed towards the purchase of eligible products only on the Blinkit  mobile application (“Blinkit Platform”).
  5. Once the Gift Card is purchased, the User cannot cancel it, return it, seek a refund for it or redeem the Gift Card for cash or credit, except where required by applicable laws.
  6. As a pre-requisite to redeeming the Gift Card, the User will be required to add the value stored on this Gift Card into their valid account on the Blinkit Platform ("Blinkit Account"). The loading of the Gift Card onto the Blinkit Platform shall constitute a registration of the User with Pinelabs.
  7. The balance in the Blinkit Account shall be deducted when the User makes purchases on the Blinkit Platform.
  8. The Gift Card can be combined with promotional codes and with other digital payment options, at Blinkit’s discretion.
  9. The Gift Card cannot be used to purchase other gift cards.
  10. The Gift Card cannot be reloaded or redeemed for cash.
  11. The unused Gift Card balances associated with a Blinkit Account cannot be transferred to another Blinkit Account.
  12. The Gift Cards may only be purchased in fixed denominations ranging from INR 500 to INR 10,000, or such other limits as Pinelabs/Blinkit may determine.
  13. In case of multiple Gift Cards being loaded to a User’s Blinkit Account, the Gift Cards having the earliest expiration date will be applied to the User’s purchases on the Blinkit Platform first.
  14. There is no fee or other charges associated with the Gift Card purchase on the Blinkit Platform.
  15. No interest will be payable by Pinelabs on any Gift Card or Gift Card balance.
  16. The Gift Card is valid for a period of 1 (one) year from the date of activation of the Gift Card.
  17. The Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. However, there may be delays in the system upto seventy-two (72) hours.
  18. Credit and debit cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase a Gift Card.
  19. Gift Card usage information shall be available on the Blinkit Platform to the User.
  20. While redeeming the Gift Cards, if the User’s purchase on the Blinkit Platform exceeds the balance in the User Blinkit Account, the remaining amount must be paid by the User through credit card, net banking, debit card or other digital payment methods available on the Platform.
  21. The User agrees and understands that the Gift Card is a prepaid payment instrument regulated by the RBI. Under the applicable laws, Blinkit / Pinelabs may be required to share the details of the Gift Card purchaser/ redeemer and/or any other information in relation to the redemption of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Cards, with RBI or other governmental/ statutory authorities. Blinkit/ Pinelabs may contact the purchaser/ redeemer (as the case may be) of the Gift Cards for any such information. By registering the Blinkit Gift Cards, the User explicitly gives their permission for the usage of their personal information to comply with RBI guidelines and regulations.
  22. The User agrees to provide truthful and accurate information during the purchase of Gift Cards. Blinkit may contact the User for further information and documents from the User to comply with KYC and anti-money laundering guidelines issued by RBI from time to time.
  23. Blinkit reserves the right to change the Gift Cards terms and conditions from time to time at its discretion and without prior notice to the User.
  24. If the Gift Card is non-functional, the User’s sole remedy (and Pinelabs/ Blinkit’s sole potential liability) shall be the replacement of such Gift Card, for the value remaining in the non-functional Gift Card.
  25. Blinkit shall consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from Users who have registered in accordance with the terms above.
  26. Any cancellations shall be at the sole discretion of Blinkit.
  27. Blinkit reserves the right to deny accepting any Gift Card if it suspects that there is duplicity of Gift Card.
  28. Blinkit reserves the right to void the Gift Card, close customer accounts and take payment from alternative forms of payment if (a) a fraudulently or unlawfully obtained Gift Card is redeemed and/or used to make purchases on the Blinkit Platform, and/or (b) the beneficiary/KYC details as per RBI guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received from.
  29. Fraudulent/unlawful/misuse of Gift Card shall result in cancellation of order, which has been made using the Gift Card without any liability of Blinkit.
  30. In case of any cancellation of orders purchased using Gift Cards, the amount will be added to the User’s ‘Blinkit Money’ balance in the Blinkit Account.
  31. The User is solely responsible for the safety and security of the Gift Card. Further, once the Gift Card has been sent to the User, the User is bound to protect the Gift Card’s 16 digit code and 6 digit PIN as the same constitutes confidential information. Blinkit/Pinelabs shall not be responsible to provide new Gift Cards in the event (a) this confidentiality obligation is breached by the User, or (b) Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission or unlawfully.
  32. The Blinkit Platform will honour and consider requests for blocking of the Gift Cards upon receipt of (i) such request from the registered users of the Blinkit Platform; (ii) any court or judicial order passed by the relevant authorities; and/or (iii) any notices issued by the cyber cells.
  33. The purchaser of the Gift Card may request for the revalidation of the expired Gift Card within one (1) year from the expiry of the Gift Card. Upon receipt of such a request the Gift Card may be revalidated after due verification by the Blinkit Platform and Pinelabs as per PPI Master Directions.
  34. User agrees to indemnify Blinkit/ its affiliate, officers, directors, from all claims brought by any third party against Blinkit/ its affiliates, officers, directors, arising out of or in connection with any breach of these Terms.
  35. Blinkit does not warrant that the services and products provided to the User pursuant to these terms and conditions will be free of interruptions, errors, bugs, viruses, or security problems.
  36. Neither Pinelabs nor Blinkit makes any warranties, express or implied, with respect to Gift Cards including without limitation, any express or implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.
  37. In the event of any conflict in the terms regarding Gift Card captured here under these Terms and any other terms made available to the purchaser of the Gift Card via the Blinkit Platform, these Terms shall prevail.
  38. Blinkit makes no representation or warranty that the Blinkit Platform will always be accessible without interruption.
  39. In no event shall the liability of Blinkit for any claims arising by the purchase or usage of Gift Cards exceed the value of the respective Gift Card.
  40. The User may write to info@blinkit.com for any support with regards to usage of the Gift Cards.
  41. Pinelabs contact Information. customer support: 080-64534440 | Email: gcsupport.woohoo@pinelabs.com Website address: www.pinelabs.com
  42. Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.pinelabs.com/grievance-policy.
  43. The courts at New Delhi shall have exclusive jurisdiction for any disputes arising in relation to Gift Cards.

cpg.howToUse:
On boAt Website go to my account,
Choose boAt Credits
Add Balance into the Credits >> Enter the 16 Digit Alphanumeric gift cards codes along with Security PIN ,and submit.
Gift cards amount will be added into the Credits.

Click on Pay now.

Proceed for balance payment if applicable

tnc.content:

description: Gift your loved one jewellery of their choice with a Bluestone gift card. With a wide variety of jewellery for the entire family – Women, Men & Children, there is something for everyone at Bluestone. Your loved ones can choose certified jewelry in gold, platinum, diamonds from over 4000 designs, with popular and trendy motifs like hearts, floral, peacocks and religious.
expiry: 6 months from the date of issue.
name: BlueStone Gold E-Gift Cards
shortDescription: BlueStone Gold E-Gift Cards

tnc.content:
Gift Card(s) can be redeemed on www.bluestone.com and offline stores (www.bluestone.com/store.html)
Gift card can be redeemed on plain gold jewellery, Gold Coins, Silver Coins, Solitaire, preset Solitaires, Diamond Jewellery and Gemstone Jewellery.
On the payment page, Click on the tab "Gift Card" and enter your 16 digit Gift Card number and pin for redemption.
Multiple Gift Card(s) can be used in a single transaction. Gift Card(s) can be combined with any other payment type on www.bluestone.com
Gift cards can also be redeemed partially, as many times as a user wishes to, till its balance is consumed or it expires.
Gift cards are valid for a period of 6 months from the date of issuance to the recipient.
Gift cards cannot be used to purchase another Gift Card.
Payment mode will be Net Banking, Credit/Debit Card, Blue Cash.
Gift Card(s) once bought online, shall be considered as sold and cannot be Cancelled, Exchanged or Refunded.
If lost or misused, the Gift Card(s) cannot be replaced. Gift cards are void if resold, and cannot be exchanged for credit(s) or cash and cannot be re-validated once past expiry date.
In addition to these Terms and Conditions, BlueStone Gift Card(s) and their use on our website are also subject to BlueStone's general Terms of Use & BlueStone's decision will be final in case of any dispute.
BlueStone may change (add to, delete, or amend) these terms from time to time. Unless stated otherwise, the changes will apply to any new BlueStone gift card. Any gift cards that you purchase are for personal, non-commercial use and enjoyment only. The same may be shared with family and friends, but may not be advertised, sold or used as promotional items by the purchaser or anyone else without BlueStone's prior written consent.
All disputes, with respect to the products and services offered in this connection,are subject to Bangalore jurisdiction.
E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 - 48 hours.

description:
Welcome to the world of ONLY, where we embrace the magic of the possibilities within everyday life. That is our philosophy – ONLY is about you – and ONLY you. An amalgamation of western fashion forward styles, high quality and great value is what makes ONLY truly unique. Each style is created with this special ONLY feeling, which resonates with the self -confidence, style and carefree attitude of the style conscious millennial.
We started operations in 1995 in Denmark, and forayed into the Indian market with the launch of the first store in Mumbai in 2010. Having received an overwhelming response, we have rapidly expanded our style footprint in the country with 53 Exclusive Brand Outlets
expiry: 1 year from the date of issue
name: ONLY E-Gift Card
shortDescription:
•    Gift cards CANNOT be used Online.

•    Multiple Gift cards CAN be used in one bill.

•    Gift cards CAN be clubbed with ongoing promotions.

•    Gift cards are ACCEPTED at all Listed Outlets.

•    Any balance pending after the first usage shall expire immediately

tnc.content:
This card entitles you to shop from any of the exclusive brand ONLY stores in India
This card is the property of ONLY Retail Private Limited (Issuer)
This card is valid for a period of one year from the date of purchase/ issue. Any amount not utilised by the user/ purchaser of the card upon the expiry on the Card, will be forfeited by the Issuer
This card is valid for one time use only & the entire amount needs to be redeemed in a single transaction. Any balance pending after the first usage shall expire immediately
Use of this card constitutes acceptance of the applicable terms and conditions (visit www.only.in for detail terms and conditions) including any updation/amendment/ modification inforce/prescribed from time to time.
To know the validity on this card, sms BAL [Card Number] to 9212356161
Any amount in excess of the value of the card must be paid via alternate payment modes available at stores.
Mailing address : ONLY Retail Pvt. Ltd. The Lalit Residency, 5th Floor, The Lalit Mumbai, Sahar Airport Road, Sahar, Andheri (E), Mumbai- 400 059
In case of any dispute regarding this gift card, the decision of ONLY Retail Pvt. Ltd. shall be final and binding and all the disputes arising in respect of this card shall be subject to the jurisdiction of Mumbai courts only
In case of return of a product paid via gift card, the said amount would be available as credit note available to be redeemed at exclusive ONLY stores
This gift card is non-returnable and non-refundable neither it is encashable in part or whole.

  • Purchase and Redemption:
    1. GCs/GVs are valid only on the Cult App and cannot be redeemed on the cult website or the cult store website.
    2. GCs/GVs are applicable only for cult fitness services (e.g., memberships) and cannot be used for any products on the cult store section on the app, cult store website, or physical stores.
    3. GCs/GVs can be purchased in denominations from ₹1 to ₹10,000, or such other limits as Pine Labs may determine.
    4. To redeem, the GC/GV value must first be added to your cult app wallet. Once credited, the wallet balance can be used for multiple transactions until fully utilized or expired.
  • Expiry and Refund:
    1. Each GC/GV is valid for 1 year from the date of purchase
    2. Expired GCs/GVs may be revalidated upon request, subject to verification and additional terms.

  • Lost, Stolen, or Misused Cards:
    1. The GC/GV holder is solely responsible for its safekeeping. cult and Pine Labs are not liable for lost, stolen, or unauthorized use of a GC/GV.
    2. Requests to block a GC/GV will only be honored for registered users who have added the card to their cult account.
  • Restrictions and Limitations:
    1. GCs/GVs cannot be exchanged for cash, bank credit, or transferred to another account.
    2. GCs/GVs are non-returnable and non-refundable.
    3. Delivery of e-Gift Cards is typically instant but may take up to 24 hours in case of system delays.
    4. cult reserves the right to cancel or suspend the GC/GV program at its sole discretion without prior notice.
  • Fraud and Misuse:
    1. Pine Labs and cult may close customer accounts or recover payments if a fraudulently obtained GC/GV is redeemed or used for purchases.
  • Governing Law and Jurisdiction:
    1. These T&Cs are governed by the laws of India. Disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts at New Delhi.
  • Limitation of Liability:
    1. No warranties, express or implied, are provided regarding the GCs/GVs, including but not limited to merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.
    2. If a GC/GV is non-functional, your sole remedy is a replacement.
    3. If applicable law does not permit certain exclusions or limitations, some provisions may not apply to you.
  • Additional Information:
    1. No interest is payable by Pine Labs or Cult on GC/GV balances.
    2. Pine Labs or Cult may revise these T&Cs at its discretion without prior notice.

tnc.content:
Cleartrip Gift Cards (“Gift Cards”) are issued by Pine Labs Pvt. Ltd. ("Pine Labs"), a private limited company incorporated under the laws of India, and is authorized by the Reserve Bank of India ("RBI") to issue such Gift Cards. The Gift cards are issued under the brand name of “Qwikcilver”. By purchasing the e-Gift Card(s), you are agreeing to and accept these Terms & Conditions. Your use of the e-Gift Cards shall be deemed to be your understanding of, and agreement, to each of the terms and conditions set forth below.
The Gift Cards can be redeemed online against bookings of Hotels as applicable on www.cleartrip.com or Cleartrip Mobile App ("Platform") only. Please note that Gift Cards could be used for booking Hotel only on desktop/laptop on www.cleartrip.com.
Gift Cards can be purchased the Platform using the following payment modes only - Credit Card, Debit Card, UPI and Net Banking.
Gift Cards once purchased cannot be cancelled, unless expressly allowed to do so by Cleartrip.
Gift Cards cannot be clubbed with any other offer including but not limited to cashbacks, discounts etc. on a particular credit/debit card.
Any balance amount left on the used Gift Cards can be reused within the validity period.
Gift Cards are valid for a period of 12 months from the date of issuance.
The cardholder may request for revalidation of the expired Gift Card. Upon receipt of such request the Gift Card may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions.
Maximum amount of each Gift Card cannot exceed Rs.10,000/.
Cleartrip is not responsible if the Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission. Gift Card once issued cannot be re-issued nor can the PIN be reset. It is the responsibility of the customer to ensure that the Gift Card once purchased is not lost, stolen, or used without the purchaser’s consent.
The Gift Cards cannot be replaced, refunded, or exchanged for cash.
If the order value exceeds the Gift Card amount, the balance must be paid by Credit Card, Debit Card, UPI,Net Banking or any other applicable payment mode.
If the order value is less than the amount of the Gift Card, the outstanding balance (after deduction of order value) will reflect under the same Gift Card and can be used for subsequent transactions.
Convenience Fee will be applicable for all Gift Card bookings (as how it's applicable for any payment method).
In case of transaction failures after Gift Card is applied, amount would be automatically refunded to the same cards as per the terms of use of the Cleartrip platform.
Cleartrip reserves the right to deny accepting any Gift Card if it suspects that there is fraud or duplicity of Gift Cards.
Products and services offered by Cleartrip are subject to availability and terms of use of the Cleartrip platform.
In no event the liability of Cleartrip for any claims arising by the purchase or usage of Gift Cards shall exceed the value of the respective Gift Card.
You shall be responsible for maintaining strict confidentiality of the Gift Card pin/ Gift Card unique number issued to you. Cleartrip shall not be responsible to provide you new Gift Cards in the event this confidentiality obligation is breached by you. Any misuse/unauthorised disclosure of Gift Cards shall result in cancellation of the booking of the flight ticket/hotel, as applicable, without any liability of Cleartrip.
Gift Cards are for individual use only, Travel agents found using Gift Cards would lead to cancellation of booking and no refund would be made.
You can combine a maximum of 15 Gift Cards in a single booking for Hotels booking.
Gift Card balance and transactions can be viewed. https://cleartripgcbal.qwikcilver.com/QwikCilver/sclp.ssa/welcome.aspx?orgname=Cleartrip
Credit and Debit Cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase Gift Cards
Gift Cards cannot be used to purchase other Gift Cards
Gift Cards cannot be redeemed for Cash or Credit.
Gift Cards cannot be reloaded or resold.
Any offer on Gift Cards including offers by banks and instant cash backs could be withdrawn anytime at the sole discretion of Cleartrip/ Pine Labs.
Gift Cards are subject to the relevant RBI guidelines and other statutory guidelines. Cleartrip at any point of times reserves the right to request from You to provide relevant ID proof and other documents as required under law from time to time. In case You are unable to provide the same, then Gift Cards issued to you may be suspended and/or terminated. You expressly agree and acknowledge that You shall have no claims against us for the balance forfeited from Your Gift Card due to such reason.
Pine Labs Pvt. Ltd./Cleartrip reserves the right to cancel the Gift Card if the same have been found to be purchased with fraudulent means and/or the beneficiary/Know Your Customer ("KYC") details as per RBI Guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received.
Cleartrip at its sole discretion reserves the right to change or revise the above terms and conditions. You shall be responsible to update yourself on the revised terms and conditions and Terms of Use at the time of accessing or using Gift Cards.
You agree and understand that Gift Cards are a pre-paid payment Instrument subjected to regulations by RBI Under the RBI guidelines, Cleartrip/ Pine Labs may be required to share KYC details of the purchaser/ redeemer of the Gift Card and/or any other information with relation to the purchase of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Card with RBI or such statutory authorities. Cleartrip/ Pine Labs may contact the purchaser/redeemer of the GC for any such information.There is no fee or other charges associated with Gift Card purchase.
There is no fee or other charges associated with Gift Card purchase.
Dispute Resolution:
Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.qwikcilver.com/grievance-policy/.com and Phone No. +91 95 95 333 333
Any disputes concerning Gift Cards shall be subject to jurisdiction in Bangalore and you by purchasing Gift Card agree and submit to such jurisdiction.
By purchasing this gift voucher, you consent to sharing your PII ( Name, Email ID, Telephone Number if available ) with the issuer ( PineLabs ), as per the guidelines of PPI.

cpg.howToUse:
1. Customer selects required product
  2. Submits mandatory details
  3. Reaches to checkout page
  4. Selects Gift Card as mode of payment
  5. Submits Gift Card details (16 Digit number and PIN) and clicks redeem button
  6. System validates card details in backend and displays card balance
  7. On successful validation, the redeem button gets activated
  8. Customer selects redeem button and redemption process of the card gets initiated
  9. On successful redemption, total value of the invoice gets adjusted with redeemed value. Maximum of three gift cards can be redeemed in one single invoice
  10. System displays balance amount (if any) to pay
  11. Customer selects another mode of payment (UPI, CC, DC etc.) and initiates payment
  12. On successful payment, transaction gets closed and order gets placed

description:
EaseMyTrip commenced its operations in 2008 by focusing on the B2B2C (business to business to customer) distribution channel and providing travel agents access to its website to book domestic travel airline tickets in order to cater to the offline travel market in India. Subsequently, by leveraging its B2B2C channel, the company commenced operations in the B2C (business to customer) distribution channel in 2011by primarily focusing on the growing Indian middle class population’s travel requirements. With our presence in the B2B2C and B2C channels, we were able to commence operations in the B2E (business to enterprise) distribution channel in 2013 with the aim of providing end-to-end travel solutions to corporates. Our presence in three distinct distribution channels provide us with a diversified customer base and wide distribution network.
We have been providing customers with the option of no-convenience fee, such that customers are not required to pay any service fee in instances where there are no alternate discount or promotion coupon being availed. In our pricing model, we have endeavoured to avoid hidden costs, which result in increasing the final price payable by the customer.
We believe that the strength of our brand, the quality of our services, our user-friendly websites (www.easemytrip.com and www.easemytrip.in), android and iOS based mobile applications (EaseMyTrip), our customer centric approach, as well as our efficient marketing programs have enabled us to develop significant market share in the domestic airline ticket business in India. In Fiscal 2019, GoAir, and SpiceJet, recognized us as amongst the top travel partners in terms of revenue and passenger count. The strength of our brand has increased significantly over the years.

description: With EatSure, you can order food from Multiple Restaurants in a Single Order! Now, keep the worries of food safety & hygiene at bay for there’s 200+ quality checks and no artificial colours or flavours! Time to indulge in the most loved & trusted brands across the country.
expiry: 1 year from the date of issue.
name: EatSure E-Gift Card
shortDescription: EatSure E-Gift Card-B2B

tnc.content:
• The “EatSure Gift Card” is redeemable only on the EatSure iOS/android app
  • The EatSure Gift Card is issued by Pine Labs Limited (formerly known as Pine Labs Private Limited), a company incorporated under the laws of India, and is authorized by the Reserve Bank of India ("RBI") to issue such Gift Cards.
  • Every holder of Gift Cards shall be required to add the value stored on such Gift Card into the EatSure User Account
  • You agree and understand that the EatSure Gift Card is a pre-paid payment Instrument subjected to regulations by RBI under the RBI guidelines. Rebel Marketplace India Private Limited / Pine Labs may be required to share KYC details of the purchaser/ redeemer of the EatSure Gift Card and/or any other information with relation to the purchase of the EatSure Gift Card and/or transaction undertaken using the EatSure Gift Card with RBI or such statutory authorities. Rebel Marketplace India Private Limited / Pine Labs may contact the purchaser/redeemer of the EatSure Gift Card for any such information.
  • In the event the beneficiary/Know Your Customer (KYC;) details as per RBI Guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient, Rebel Marketplace India Private Limited /Pine Labs retain the right to cancel the Gift Card so issued
  • Rebel Marketplace India Private Limited shall honour and consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from users who have registered in accordance with the terms
  • The EatSure Gift Card can be purchased by debit cards and credit cards issued by Indian Banks. No Gift Card may be purchased by cash or by prepaid wallets.
  • The EatSure Gift Card cannot be used to purchase another EatSure Gift Card
  • No cash withdrawal is permissible against the EatSure Gift Card
  • Rebel Marketplace India Private Limited / Pine Labs Private Limited reserves the right to cancel the EatSure Gift Card if the same have been found to be purchased with fraudulent means. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received.
  • In case the order is cancelled within the timeframe as mentioned in the Cancellation Policy, wherein the Customer has redeemed the EatSure Gift Card, in such scenario the Customers’ EatSure Gift Card shall be credited with the amount equivalent to the redemption amount.
  • The cardholder may request for the revalidation of the expired Gift Card. Upon receipt of such request, the EatSure Gift Card may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions
  • To redeem, user must enter the 16-digit Gift Card number and the mpin on the payment/check out page
  • If the value of the service exceeds the value of the Gift Card, the difference must be paid by the user through other available payment modes
  • The EatSure Gift Card can be redeemed multiple times until value of the Gift Card is exhausted
  • User cannot club more than 1 Gift Card in one order
  • No fees or charges apply to the purchase Gift Cards
  • Delivery charges and taxes as applicable
  • This Gift Card does not allow any top up or reload
  • The EatSure Gift Card is valid for a period of 12 months from the date of issue
  • The user is solely responsible for the safety and security of the Gift card. EatSure and/or Pine Labs are not responsible for any acts of omission or commission if Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission
  • No duplicate card shall be issued
  • EatSure shall not be held liable or responsible for any unauthorized and/or fraudulent purchase/s made using this Gift Card.
  • The Gift card is non-returnable & non-refundable, and cannot be exchanged for cash in part or full
  • Gift Cards are normally sent instantly via email/SMS. However, in case of system issues, the delivery may take up to 24 hours.
  • In case of any disputes, EatSure reserves the right to identify the authenticity of the Gift Card
  • EatSure reserves the right to amend the terms & conditions at its discretion without prior notice
  • For any enquiries, email at goodness@eatsure.com
  • Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.qwikcilver.com/grievance-policy/
  • All disputes with relation to the Gift Card shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts located at Bangalore
  • E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 - 48 hours.
  • No returns and no refunds on gift cards, e-gift cards and gift vouchers shipped by woohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

By purchasing this gift voucher, you consent to sharing your PII ( Name, Email ID, Telephone Number if available ) with the issuer ( PineLabs ), as per the guidelines of PPI

tnc.content:
This gift card (“Gift Card”) is issued by Forever New Apparel Private Limited ("Forever New ") and can be redeemed only against purchase of eligible products from retail outlets of Forever New or its website i.e. https://www.forevernew.co.in/.
The Gift Card once purchased are non-cancellation and non-refundable
This Gift Card holds no value until activated with a minimum amount of Rs. 1,000/- and a maximum of Rs. 10,000/-.
This Gift Card cannot be recharged.
The Gift Card cannot be used to purchase other gift cards.
The Gift Card can be used till balance or validity.
Bearer of the Gift Card will have to present this Gift Card at the time of billing to redeem the value against purchase of products. The value of the Gift Card will deplete with every purchase made by the bearer. Balance available on the Gift Card cannot be exchanged for cash and can be redeemed only against future purchases.
The Gift Card can only be used to make purchases up to the value of the Gift Card. If the bearer wished to make purchases for an amount that exceeds the balance available on the Gift Card, the bearer will have to pay the amount exceeding the balance using another mode of payment.
Forever New may, at its sole discretion, pass on the benefits of consumer promotions to the bearer of Gift Card.
This Gift Card is not credit or debit or charge card and has no implied warranties.
This Gift Card is valid for a period of 12 months from the date of issue or the last transaction, whichever is later.
All refunds/exchanges of products purchased with the Gift Card will be made in accordance with refund policy of Forever New and reimbursed funds will not be reloaded on the Gift Card, unless otherwise determined by Forever New in its sole discretion,
Any unused balance on the Gift Card after expiry of the above validity period will not be refunded in cash or credit for redemption.
The bearer of the Gift Card will be considered the bonafide recipient of the benefits of redemption.
Lost or stolen or damaged Gift Card will not be replaced or the balance, if any, will not be refunded.
Forever New may, use the information provided by the purchaser of the Gift Card for communicating new promotions, launch of products or similar other purposes.
Forever New reserves the right to cancel any Gift Card or the scheme pursuant to which this Gift Card has been issued, for any reason at any time without notice. Under such circumstances, Forever New may, at its sole discretion, either refund the balance value of the Gift Card to the bearer or replace the Gift Card of equivalent value.
Laws prevailing in India shall be applicable and courts in Delhi India shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
This Gift Card is the property of Forever New and Forever New reserves the right to modify/alter/amend the terms and conditions without prior intimation.
Any person or bearer using this Gift Card shall be deemed to have accepted all the terms and conditions.
Forever New reserves the right to amend the list of the participating stores at its sole discretion.
The terms and conditions governing the Gift Card shall be in addition to and not in substitution / derogation to the other terms and conditions of the Forever New.
Forever New reserves the right to cancel an order placed by using Gift Card in case of any fraudulent activity done or any violation of the terms and conditions.

  • The Gift Card may be redeemed at participating Hotels by providing the 16-digit card number and the OTP at the time of redemption. The Gift Card must be activated to avail redemption
  • Gift Card may be used only at participating ITC’s Hotels Group in India.
  • All Gift Cards issued shall have a validity period of 1 (one) year from the date of issuance of cards.
  • Cash-out or funds transfer shall not be permitted for this Gift Card. However, the funds may be transferred ‘back to source account’ (account from where Gift Card was loaded) after receiving consent of the Gift Card holder.
  • This Gift Card is cash equivalent. Pine Labs, ITC or their affiliates are not responsible if this Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission.
  • In case the customer approaches Pine Labs for refund of any amount, at any time after the expiry date of the Gift Card, then the same shall be paid to the customer in their bank.
  • Reloading is not applicable in case of this Gift Card.
  • Any dispute shall be referred to Pine Labs and the decision of Pine Labs shall be final.
  • Subject to the foregoing, these terms and conditions shall be subject to the jurisdiction of courts at Gurugram, India.
  • Pine Labs & ITC reserve the entitlement to amend these terms and conditions from time to time. Any change in these terms and conditions can be viewed on the website https://itchotels.woohoo.in/.
  • No fees or charges apply to Gift Cards.
  • The cardholder may request for the revalidation of the expired gift card. Upon receipt of such request the gift card may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions. Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.Pine Labs.com/grievance-policy/
  • The card is valid for spends towards stays (room and incidental charges), food & beverages, home deliveries and takeaways, spa services (for resident guests only), Fabelle boutiques, Sleeep Boutique and applicable taxes at any of the participating hotels.
  • The card is not valid for spends towards settling banquet charges, paid-outs like car transfers, spends at retail or any third-party service establishment at participating hotels, or any expenses of personal nature for which a pay-out is raised such as buying medicines, repairs of personal items etc.
  • The cards cannot be used to settle stays booked on/through
    1. Corporate rates
    2. Group rates
    3. Online Travel Agents (OTAs)
    4. Any discounted or contracted room rates
  • The card shall not be valid for withdrawal of cash or currency exchange.
  • Multiple transactions can be performed on gift card until the value of the card is exhausted.
  • Should the purchase value exceed the card value, the differential amount of such purchase shall have to be paid at the point of sale either in cash or through an accepted credit or debit card, at the time of making such purchase. International Cards won’t be accepted for making payments.
  • Club ITC Green Points shall not be awarded for transaction settled using Gift Cards. However, for transactions settled with a combination of Gift Card and any other eligible payment mode the Club ITC Green Points may be awarded for the differential amount being settled through the alternate payment mode.
  • Handling refunds: A. Refunds in case of failed / returned / rejected / cancelled transactions shall be provided to the respective Gift Card within 14 working days, to the extent that payment was made initially by debit to the Gift Card. B. Refunds in case of failed / returned / rejected / cancelled transactions using any other payment instrument shall be credited back to the payment source.
  • The Gift Card can be purchased for a minimum value of ₹1,000 and maximum value of ₹10,000 per transaction.
  • The Gift Card will be delivered to the recipient’s email address as entered in the form on the same day unless the delivery is scheduled for a particular day.
  • For any queries, balance check and date of expiry please visit https://itchotels.woohoo.in/CheckBalance and input the Card Number in the ‘Check Balance’ section.
  • In case of theft, kindly report the same to Pine Labs at support.woohoo.in. Upon verification of the identity of the guest, the card shall be blocked and a fresh card shall be reissued. The card is a cash equivalent bearer card. Pine Labs, ITC and their affiliates shall not be responsible for lost or stolen cards and any misuse thereof. A reissued card shall have the balance validity of the original issued card, subject to any transactions that may have been made through the said Gift Card.
  • Redemption of the card by its bearer shall be valid discharge of Pine Labs and ITC's liabilities in respect of the card.
  • The card is subject to applicable laws. The card holder shall comply with all applicable laws promulgated by any statutory/judicial/competent authority from time to time in this regard.
  • By purchasing this gift voucher, you consent to sharing your PII (Name, Email ID, Telephone Number if available) with the issuer (PineLabs), as per the guidelines of PPI.
  • For queries, email at customer.service@itchotels.com or reach us at: The Direct Marketing Cell, ITC Limited-Hotels Division, ITC Green Centre, 10, Institutional Area, Sector 32, Gurgaon-122001.

description:
Jos Alukkas is a name to reckon in the jewellery industry. Designing jewellery in gold, diamond and platinum for over five decades, Jos Alukkas is the first ISO 9001:2000 certified jewellery group in the world showcasing BIS certified 916 hallmarked gold. The jewellery brand has become a trusted name in quality, innovative, trendy jewellery, with 40-plus showrooms and an online store too.
A pioneer in introducing the gold supermarket concept in India, Jos Alukkas has steadily grown into a favourite jewellery name across the country and abroad. Every Jos Alukkas showroom is a one-stop shop for your jewellery dreams. Pure jewellery, inspiring designs, comfortable ambience, courteous staff and great deals guarantee you a never-before jewellery shopping experience.

description:
Jockey is the leading manufacturer and marketer of comfort apparel sold in more than 140 countries around the world as well as one of the world’s most loved and easily recognised brands. Founded in 1876, Jockey has pioneered innerwear as we know it today, evolving and innovating not only products, but also the way it has been marketed over the years. Today, after etching its presence in the innerwear category, Jockey has moved to widening its offering in the outerwear category with T-shirts, Jackets, Trackpants, Loungewear, Socks, Towels, Tank Tops, Capris, Shorts and the entire Kidswear range. 
As Jockey grows in size and sophistication, the simple commitment to serve its customers’ need for comfort continues to be the brand’s hallmark. Jockey is committed to quality, comfort, fashion, innovation and value no matter the apparel. 
Page Industries Limited, located in Bangalore, India, is the exclusive licensee of Jockey International Inc. (USA) for manufacture, distribution and marketing of the JOCKEY brand

One of Europe's leading producers of menswear, JACK & JONES is riding high on a strong legacy of craftsmanship, unmatched quality and exemplary style. With humble beginnings that are dated back to 1990, the brand today holds an inimitable position in the sphere of trend inspired fashion for the cosmopolitan man.
While Jeans are the life-blood of JACK & JONES, the brand prides itself in offering a carefully curated selection of fashion forward apparel, accessories and footwear for the modern man.
