•    Gift cards cannot be used to purchase other Pepperfry Gift Cards, if any.

•    Gift card cannot be redeemed on Pepperfry Mobile App

•    If the order value exceeds the Pepperfry gift cards amount, the balance must be paid by Credit Card/Debit Card/Internet Banking/Wallets. Cash Pay, Part Pay and COD cannot be used to pay the balance amount.

tnc.content:
• Pepperfry Gift Card(s) (referred to as "Pepperfry GCs" or Pepperfry eGCs) are issued by Pine Labs Limited (formerly known as Pine Labs Private Limited), a company incorporated under the laws of India, and is authorized by the Reserve Bank of India ("RBI") to issue such Gift Cards.
  • The Pepperfry Gift Cards (Pepperfry GCs) so issued can be used for any purchase listed on www.pepperfry.com.
  • Pepperfry GCs will be valid for a period of 1 (One) year from the Date of Issue of Pepperfry GCs.
  • Pepperfry GCs can be redeemed by selecting the payment mode ”Pepperfry Gift Card”.
  • Pepperfry GCs cannot be redeemed on Pepperfry Mobile App.
  • No cash withdrawal is permissible against the Pepperfry GCs.
  • Pepperfry GCs cannot be used to purchase other Pepperfry Gift Cards, if any.
  • If the order value exceeds the Pepperfry GCs amount, the balance must be paid by Credit Card/Debit Card/Internet Banking/Wallets. Cash Pay, Part Pay and COD cannot be used to pay the balance amount.
  • If the order value is less than the amount of the Pepperfry GCs, the outstanding balance (after deduction of order value) will reflect under the same Pepperfry GCs and can be used for subsequent transactions till its validity.
  • In case the Order is cancelled by the Customer within the timeframe as mentioned in the Cancellation Policy, wherein the Customer has redeemed the Pepperfry GCs, in such scenario the Customers’ Pepperfry GCs shall be credited with the amount equivalent to the redemption amount.
  • Once the Pepperfry GCs has been sent to you, you are bound to protect the Pepperfry GCs PIN or Gift Card number as confidential. In the event of any misuse of Pepperfry Gift Cards due to loss of any such confidential details due to the fault of the purchaser, Pine Labs, Trendsutra Platform Services Private Limited (Pepperfry.com) or their affiliates shall not be responsible for the same and no refund can be issued.
  • Pine Labs/ Pepperfry.com reserves the right to cancel the Pepperfry GCs if the same have been found to be purchased with fraudulent means. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received.
  • In the event the beneficiary/Know Your Customer ("KYC") details as per RBI Guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient, Pepperfry.com /Pine Labs retain the right to cancel the Pepperfry GCs so issued.
  • You agree and understand that Pepperfry GCs are a pre-paid payment Instrument subjected to regulations by RBI Under the RBI guidelines. Pepperfry.com / Pine Labs may be required to share KYC details of the purchaser/ redeemer of the Pepperfry GCs and/or any other information with relation to the purchase of the Pepperfry GCs and/or transaction undertaken using the Pepperfry GCs with RBI or such statutory authorities. Pepperfry.com / Pine Labs may contact the purchaser/redeemer of the Pepperfry GCs for any such information.
  • The company purchasing the Gift Cards shall, at all times, keep the passwords that are created by the company or its customers/beneficiaries on the Website and the Gift Card Pin generated strictly confidential and not reveal the same to any person or entity.
  • For the detailed Terms and Conditions applicable to Pepperfry GCs, please visit on our TnC page www.pepperfry.com/gv-tnc.
  • No returns and no refunds on gift cards, E- gift cards and gift vouchers shipped by Pine Labs. Please check the refund policy at www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.
  • No fees or charges apply to Pepperfry GCs.
  • Every holder of Pepperfry GCs shall be required to add the value stored on such Pepperfry GCs into the Pepperfry Wallet/Pepperfry User Account as a pre-requisite to the redemption of the Pepperfry GCs. The loading of the Pepperfry GCs onto the Pepperfry Wallet/Pepperfry User Account shall constitute registration of the User.
  • Pepperfry (Trendsutra Platforms Services Private Limited) shall honour and consider requests for blocking of Pepperfry GCs only from users who have registered in accordance with the terms above.
  • Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.qwikcilver.com/grievance-policy
  • The cardholder may request for the revalidation of the expired Pepperfry GCs. Upon receipt of such request the Pepperfry GCs may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions.

By purchasing this gift voucher, you consent to sharing your PII ( Name, Email ID, Telephone Number if available ) with the issuer ( PineLabs ), as per the guidelines of PPI

cpg.howToUse:
•    At Offline Outlets:

•    Customer comes to Pizza Hut outlet and expresses his intent of using Gift Card as payment mode

•    Selects merchandise and shares gift card details with cashier

•    Cashier prepared invoice and selects gift card tender as payment mode

•    Submits gift card details i.e., Card number, and PIN and amount in suggested field

•    Qwikcilver system will validate card details and as a response will display card balance

•    On successful validation cashier will be prompted to click on redeem button, post confirmation from the customer clicks redemption button and card gets redeemed

•    On successful redemption total invoice value will get reduced by redeemed value

•    In case of the total invoice value goes higher than GC Redeemed value, customer is requested to opt for other mode of payment like credit / debit / wallet or cash for balance payment

•    On successful payment bill gets closed

•    At Online (E-Commerce Portal / M-App):

•    Customer selects the product

•    Reaches to checkout page to apply the voucher code/ coupon and Gift Card details.

•    Selects Gift Card on Checkout

•    The first 5 digits of gift card will be pre-selected in the field, customer needs to input the balance digit only

•    Submit pin for validation post entering card details

•    System validates card details and displays available amount to redeem

•    Customer clicks on redemption button

•    On successful redemption total invoice value gets reduced by Gift Card redeemed value

•    System displays balance amount (if any) to be paid by customers

•    Customer pays the balance amount using another accepted mode of payment like Credit Card / Debit Card or wallet

•    Customer completes the checkout process; transaction gets completed and order gets confirmed

tnc.content:
At Offline Outlets:

  1. Customer comes to Pizza Hut outlet and expresses intent of using Gift Card as payment mode.
  2. Selects the products and shares gift card details with cashier.
  3. Cashier prepares invoice and selects gift card tender as payment mode.
  4. Cashier submits gift card details i.e., Card number, Card PIN and Amount in suggested field.
  5. On successful validation and post confirmation from the Customer, Cashier clicks redemption button and the gift card gets redeemed.
  6. On successful redemption, total invoice value will get adjusted by redeemed value.
  7. In case of the total invoice value goes higher than GC Redeemed value, customers are requested to opt for other mode of payment like credit / debit / wallet or cash for balance payment.
  8. On successful payment, bill gets closed.

At Online platforms (E-Commerce Portal / M-App):

  1. Customer adds products to cart and proceeds to checkout
  2. Selects Gift Card option on Checkout page
  3. The first 5 digits of gift card will be pre-selected in the field, customer needs to input the balance digits only
  4. Submit pin for validation post entering card details
  5. System validates card details and displays available amount to redeem
  6. Customer clicks on redemption button
  7. On successful redemption, total invoice value gets reduced by Gift Card redeemed value
  8. System displays balance amount (if any) to be paid by customers
  9. Customer pays the balance amount using another accepted mode of payment like Credit Card / Debit Card or wallet
  10. Customer completes the checkout process; transaction gets completed and order gets confirmed

description: Jos Alukkas is a name to reckon in the jewellery industry. Designing jewellery in gold, diamond and platinum for over five decades, Jos Alukkas is the first ISO 9001:2000 certified jewellery group in the world showcasing BIS certified 916 hallmarked gold. The jewellery brand has become a trusted name in quality, innovative, trendy jewellery, with 40-plus showrooms and an online store too. A pioneer in introducing the gold supermarket concept in India, Jos Alukkas has steadily grown into a favourite jewellery name across the country and abroad. Every Jos Alukkas showroom is a one-stop shop for your jewellery dreams. Pure jewellery, inspiring designs, comfortable ambience, courteous staff and great deals guarantee you a never-before jewellery shopping experience.

description: SMART Bazaar is one of the largest & fastest growing Grocery retail chains in India.Synonymous to its name, SMART Bazaar is a new age supermarket serving the needs of today’s smart and value seeking customers. SMART Bazaar offers a one-stop shopping experience by offering fresh produce, bakery, dairy products, home and personal care products, general merchandise, smart apparels and appliances, making it a complete shopping destination. SMART Bazaar’s incredible value proposition rewards shoppers more for bigger purchases, every single time they shop, with 100% assortment being offered below MRP all year round. All this while delivering superior quality products, best of the brands, latest launches and a world-class shopping experience.Further strengthening the value proposition SMART Bazaar stores offer Reliance Retail Private Brands. Our Private Brands offer product choices across 110 categories spread over staples to processed foods and beverages, personal care, cosmetics and fragrances to health and hygiene, fabric and home care to home décor range. GoodLife, Snactac, Yeah!, Desi Kitchen, Purik, Enzo, Get Real, My Home, Samvaad, Glimmer, Petals & Happy Living are some of the private brands which are diligently crafted and quality tested products offering outstanding value proposition.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation

description:
Sterling Holiday Resorts Limited was founded with a dream of making holidays an active part of the Indian consumer’s lifestyle. Our guests have enjoyed priceless holidays at exceptional destinations all across the country for over 30 years. 
Today, holidays are much more than accommodation and food. The new age traveller seeks immersive experiential holidays that are more than just the ordinary. Catering to this, our renewed brand promise - ‘Holiday Differently’, presents you with the chance to explore diverse destinations and discover exciting experiences for an unforgettable holiday. With 2200+ rooms spread across 30+ resorts in a myriad of destinations and a host of unique and curated experiences to offer, we are today the country’s leading experiential holiday company.
We at Sterling, bring together a fusion of warm Indian hospitality and the highest standards of service. Our Service philosophy stands on three key pillars: our People, with passionate and outstanding service, Experiences, that are unique and enriching, and lastly, our Destinations, rich and diverse, each with so much to offer. These are tied into our service philosophy of PEPS (People, Experiences, Places- Spark Joy) and this is exactly what we endeavor to do, spark joy at every interaction, with every action.
expiry: 12 Months from the date of issue
name: Sterling Holidays E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
Sterling Holidays Gift Card is powered by Qwikcilver Solutions Private Limited.
  • Sterling Holidays / Qwikcilver shall honour and consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from users who have registered in accordance with the terms of Gift Card mentioned below.
  • Valid Gift Card in its original form (Email/SMS) has to be presented at the time of availing a service.
  • Gift Card may be used only at participating Sterling Resorts in India against specific services
  • All Gift Cards issued shall have a validity period of 1 year from the date of issuance of cards.
  • This Gift Card cannot be transferred for balance value or redeemed for cash.
  • This Gift Card is cash equivalent. Qwikcilver, Sterling Holidays or their affiliates are not responsible if this Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission.
  • No refund, replacement or cash back would be considered against the Gift Card.
  • Reload is not applicable in case of gift card.
  • Any dispute shall be referred to Qwikcilver and the decision of Qwikcilver will be final.
  • Subject to the foregoing, these terms and conditions shall be subject to the jurisdiction of courts at Chennai, India.
  • Qwikcilver & STERLING HOLIDAYS reserve the entitlement to amend these terms and conditions from time to time. Any change in these terms and conditions can be viewed on our website https://www.qwikcilver.com/terms-and-conditions/. No fees or charges apply to Gift Cards.
  • Qwikcilver, STERLING HOLIDAYS or their affiliates will not be liable for the misuse of the card.
  • The card is valid for spends towards stay and applicable taxes at any of the participating Resorts when booked on www.sterlingholidays.com website.
  • The card is not valid for spends towards settling banquet charges, paid-outs like car transfers, spends at retail or any third party service establishment at participating Resorts, or any expenses of personal nature for which a pay-out is raised such as buying medicines, sightseeing charges etc.
  • The Gift Card cannot be used as a deposit,
  • The cards cannot be used to settle stays booked on/thru
      a. Corporate rates
      b. Group rates
      c. Online Travel Agents (OTA’s)
      d. Any discounted or contracted room rates
      e. Travel Agents/Intermediaries
      f. Any commission agents
  • The Gift Card shall not be applicable for redemption in conjunction with any other offer/promotion or benefit(s)
  • The card shall not be valid for withdrawal of cash or currency exchange.
  • Multiple transactions can be performed on gift card until the value of the card is exhausted.
  • Should the purchase value exceed the card value, the differential amount of such purchase shall have to be paid at the point of sale through an accepted credit or debit card, at the time of making a reservation.
  • A card once issued cannot be cancelled or refunded.
  • The Gift Card can be purchased for a minimum value of ₹1000 and maximum value of ₹50,000 per transaction. The gift card can also be purchases against a Holiday package as per the inclusions mentioned in the package and can be redeemed only against the same package only
  • The Gift Card will be delivered instantly to the recipient’s email address as entered in the form on the same day unless the delivery is scheduled for a particular day.
  • For any queries, balance check and date of expiry please visit https://www.woohoo.in/balenq and input the Card Number in the ‘Check Balance’ section.
  • To check balance and expiry of your Sterling Holidays Gift Card, please send a SMS from your registered mobile number as follows to receive the details via SMS.
  • BAL<space>Card Number to 9963900600
  • In case of theft, kindly report the same to Qwikcilver. Upon verification of the identity of the guest the card will be blocked and a fresh card will be reissued. The card is a cash equivalent bearer card. Qwikcilver, STERLING HOLIDAYS & its affiliates shall not be responsible for lost or stolen cards and any misuse thereof. A reissued card shall have the balance validity of the original issued card.
  • Redemption of the card by its bearer shall be valid discharge of Qwikcilver & Sterling liabilities in respect of the card.
  • The card is subject to applicable laws. The card holder shall comply with all applicable laws promulgated by any statutory/judicial/competent authority from time to time in this regard.
  • For queries, email at crs@sterlingholidays.com or call us at 9003302727.

description:
SpiceJet is one of India’s most preferred low-cost airline. It has been constantly delivering the lowest air fares with the highest consumer value, to price sensitive consumers. SpiceJet has been clocking the highest industry OTP (On-time performance) regularly in 2017.
SpiceJet thrives to fulfil everyone’s dream of flying! So, it brings to you SpiceJet Gift cards with some very unique features. It allows customers to travel to destinations of their choice at a time convenient to them. The cards are valid for air fare as well as add-ons on SpiceJet.
expiry: 12 Months from the date of Activation.
name: SpiceJet E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
Limited Period offer for flight bookings done on www.spicejet.com

  • FREE Priority Check-in & Bag-out First (You 1st)
  • Zero Convenience Fee

How to avail- Free Priority Check-in & Zero Convenience Fee

  1. Search and select your preferred flight from www.spicejet.com
  2. Select YouFirst on the add-ons page (Priority Check-in & Bag-out First combo) while booking the flight tickets.
  3. Select SpiceJet Gift Card as the payment mode on the payments page.
  4. Instant discount equivalent to the amount of You1st shall be automatically applied and no convenience fees would be charged.
  5. Pay the Full transaction amount with SpiceJet Gift Card only to avail this Offer.

    6. Terms and conditions of the offer:

    1. The Offer is applicable only for Flight tickets booked from 31st March, 2022 (the “Offer Period”) to 31st December, 2025 (the “Offer Period”)
    2. There is no restriction on travel dates. Customers can book any available flight www.spicejet.com
    3. The Offer is valid only on bookings made online on SpiceJet Website www.spicejet.com.
    4. This Offer is valid only for flight tickets booked by making complete payment using by SpiceJet Gift Cards.
    5. SpiceJet reserves the right to modify/change/withdraw/amend/cancel all or any of the terms & conditions applicable to this Offer without assigning any reasons or prior intimation.
    6. The Offer is non-transferable, non-binding and non-encashable.
    7. This Offer, in no manner, can be clubbed with any other scheme/offer/discount/promotion etc. prevailing on SpiceJet Website www.spicejet.com or elsewhere.
    8. SpiceJet in its sole discretion reserves the right to deny or cancel the booking in the event of any misuse or abuse of this Offer.
    9. In no event the liability of SpiceJet under this Offer shall exceed the amount of promotional discount provided under this Offer.
    10. In the event of any discrepancy arising out of any matter connected with this Offer, decision of SpiceJet shall be final and binding.
    11. Any person availing the Offer shall deemed to have accepted the applicable terms and conditions of the Offer and also the terms of carriage as available at http://www.spicejet.com/Tnc.aspx.
    12. Disputes, if any, arising out of this Offer will be subject to Indian laws and shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Delhi

    TERMS & CONDITIONS-For SpiceJet Gift Cards

    1. This SpiceJet Gift Card (“Gift Card”) is valid for the period mentioned on the Card. Any unused balance therein will expire after expiry date.
    2. Gift Card is redeemable only on bookings of Flights and Add-ons Services available on SpiceJet website www.spiceJet.com.
    3. Gift Card is redeemable on Add-ons Services (listed below) only on Pre-Booking the services, while booking Flight or in Manage Booking at www.spiceJet.com
      • Meals, SpiceMax, Priority Check-in, Bag-out first, Spice Assurance, Insurance and Excess baggage.
    4. A customer can use a maximum of 3 (three) Gift Card in one transaction for the booking of Flights or above mentioned Services.
    5. Gift Card cannot be redeemed to make bookings on SpiceJet Mobile App, reservations and airport ticketing counter of SpiceJet.
    6. Redemption Process:
      • Select the Flight and other add-on services and fill the required details on the website of SpiceJet.
      • Select the 'SpiceJet Gift Card' payment option as the payment mode for the flight booking and add-on services.
      • Customer will enter the Gift Card No. (14 Digit) and 6 Digit PIN No.
      • Click on the option 'Make Payment' and pay the balance amount, if any, by using other payment modes available on the website of SpiceJet.
    7. Customer must enter the 14 digit Gift Card code (printed on Gift Card) and 6 digit PIN at the time of booking Services on the website of SpiceJet.
    8. Convenience Fee would be applicable on all transactions as per SpiceJet Policy.
    9. This Gift Card cannot be clubbed with any other offer, promo-code, voucher on www.spiceJet.com or elsewhere.
    10. After one transaction, balance (if any) would remain in the Gift Card till the validity period and can be reused for subsequent transaction(s).
    11. Any unutilized balance available in Gift Card shall be non-refundable and shall be forfeited on the expiry of the Gift Card.
    12. Any amount deducted from the Gift Card(s) on unsuccessful transaction(s) would be automatically refunded into the Gift Card within 24 hours.
    13. In case of cancellation of Flight Booking, the Gift Card used for making the booking would be reloaded with the amount after deducting applicable cancellation fee.
    14. Cancellations of Flights booked using Gift Card partially or fully, can be done only online at spicejet.com
    15. Flights and services are subject to availability.
    16. The Gift Card cannot be refunded, cancelled, returned, renewed, extended or exchanged for cash.
    17. SpiceJet or its affiliates are not responsible, if a Gift Card is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission.
    18. SpiceJet is the final authority on the interpretation of the Gift Card Program.
    19. SpiceJet reserves the right to deny accepting any Gift card if it suspects that there is duplicity of cards. The Gift Card is issued by QwikCilver Solutions Private Limited.
    20. Credit and Debit Cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase Gift Card of SpiceJet.
    21. In no event the liability of SpiceJet for any claims arising under this offer shall exceed the value of the Gift Card.
    22. In the event of any dispute, parties agree to exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of New Delhi.
    23. This Gift Card is for individual use only and in case of any misuse it would lead to cancellation and forfeiture of amount.
    24. For any query/concern related to Gift Card, Customer may write to support@woohoo.in or call at 1800 419 4438.
    25. SpiceJet reserves the right that at any time without prior notice to add, alter, modify, all or any of these terms and conditions.

cpg.howToUse:
Activate your Snapdeal e-Gift Card before redeeming it.
Visit www.snapdeal.com or open the Snapdeal App and add your desired products to the cart.
Once you’re ready, go to checkout and click on “Proceed to Pay"
Choose the option “Pay using Gift Card”
Enter your 16-digit Gift Card number along with the PIN to apply it.
If your order total is higher than the Gift Card balance, simply pay the remaining amount using any of the available payment methods (UPI, Debit/Credit Card)

description: Snapdeal is India's leading pure-play value Ecommerce platform. Founded in 2010 by Kunal Bahl and Rohit Bansal, Snapdeal is one of the top four online lifestyle shopping destinations of India. Snapdeal brings together a wide assortment of good quality and value- priced merchandise on its platform. Snapdeal's vision is to enable the shoppers of Bharat to experience the joy of living their aspirations through reliable, value-for-money shopping. With a personalized, multilingual interface and cutting edge technology, Snapdeal has simplified the shopping experience for its value-conscious buyers by showcasing the most relevant products- products that are a good functional fit with their needs and of a quality that lasts- thereby delivering true value to its customers. With its commitment to high service standards, Snapdeal suppliers operate under a well structured ecosystem that enables them to offer great quality products at affordable prices. With majority of the value-seeking, middle-income, price-conscious buyers coming from the non-metros, Snapdeal’s logistics networks powered by third party logistics cover more than 96% of India’s pin codes enabling order deliveries to more than 2500 towns and cities and expanding. Further, Snapdeal's mission is to become India’s value lifestyle omni-channel leader. We are excited about continuing to build a complete ecosystem around value commerce, where we can serve Bharat consumers wherever they are on their offline to online shopping journey. Snapdeal is part of the AceVector Group and one of India’s best-known e-commerce companies with an exclusive focus on the value segment.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Snapdeal SCLP 1000 E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
Snapdeal Gift Cards (“Gift Cards” or “GCs”) are issued by Pine Labs Pvt. Ltd., a company incorporated in India and authorized by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) to issue prepaid payment instruments.
Gift Cards are redeemable only on the Snapdeal), Snapdeal Mobile App, or Snapdeal mobile site (“Platform”) against sellers listed there.
Register your Snapdeal card using the below link, prior to redemptionClick Here to activate the card.
To use a Gift Card, choose Gift Card as the payment method at checkout. A single order (even if it includes products from multiple sellers) can be paid for using this option.
The user can redeem only one gift card in a single transaction.
If the purchase amount is greater than the balance available on the Gift Card, the remaining amount must be paid through UPI, Credit Card, or Debit Card. Cash on Delivery (COD) is not permitted for such transactions.
If the order value is less than the Gift Card balance, the unused amount will stay on the same card and can be used for future purchases.
Gift Cards are valid for 12 months from the date of issuance.
Customers may request a revalidation of expired Gift Cards. Such requests will be reviewed by Pine Labs, and revalidation may be granted subject to verification and applicable conditions.
Gift Cards cannot be exchanged for cash or credit.
Snapdeal and Pine Labs are not liable for any misuse, theft, or unauthorized use of a Gift Card once issued. Customers are responsible for keeping their Gift Card number and PIN secure. In case of loss or disclosure of these details, no replacement or refund will be provided.
Snapdeal and Pine Labs are not responsible for the quality, warranty, or after-sales service of products purchased using Gift Cards. All product-related liabilities lie with the respective sellers.
Once purchased, Gift Cards cannot be canceled by the buyer. Any exception will be at the discretion of Snapdeal or Pine Labs.
If a Gift Card is found to be purchased through fraudulent means, Snapdeal/Pine Labs reserve the right to cancel it. In such cases, the value will be refunded to the original source of payment.
If the Know Your Customer (KYC) details of the purchaser/beneficiary do not meet RBI requirements or are incorrect, Snapdeal/Pine Labs may cancel the Gift Card.
Gift Cards are regulated instruments under RBI guidelines. Snapdeal/Pine Labs may share KYC or transaction details related to the purchase or redemption of Gift Cards with RBI or other regulatory authorities if required. Purchasers/redeemers may be contacted for such information.
Gift Cards are non-reloadable and cannot be resold.
Any promotional offers, including bank offers or cashback on Gift Cards, are subject to change or withdrawal at the sole discretion of Snapdeal/Pine Labs.
E-Gift Cards are usually delivered instantly via email/SMS. However, in rare cases, delivery may take up to 48–72 hours due to system delays.
Gift Cards are valid and can be redeemed only on Fashion, Home, FMCG, and BPC (Beauty and Personal care) products.
E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 48-72 hours.
No returns and no refunds on gift cards, E- gift cards and gift vouchers shipped bywoohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

Choose the option “Pay using Gift Card”
Enter your 16-digit Gift Card number along with the PIN to apply it.

Snapdeal is part of the AceVector Group and one of India’s best-known e-commerce companies with an exclusive focus on the value segment.

tnc.content:
Snapdeal Gift Cards (“Gift Cards” or “GCs”) are issued by Pine Labs Pvt. Ltd., a company incorporated in India and authorized by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) to issue prepaid payment instruments.
Gift Cards are redeemable only on the Snapdeal), Snapdeal Mobile App, or Snapdeal mobile site (“Platform”) against sellers listed there.
Register your Snapdeal card using the below link, prior to redemptionClick Here to activate the card.
To use a Gift Card, choose Gift Card as the payment method at checkout. A single order (even if it includes products from multiple sellers) can be paid for using this option.
The user can redeem only one gift card in a single transaction.
If the purchase amount is greater than the balance available on the Gift Card, the remaining amount must be paid through UPI, Credit Card, or Debit Card. Cash on Delivery (COD) is not permitted for such transactions.
If the order value is less than the Gift Card balance, the unused amount will stay on the same card and can be used for future purchases.
Gift Cards are valid for 12 months from the date of issuance.
Customers may request a revalidation of expired Gift Cards. Such requests will be reviewed by Pine Labs, and revalidation may be granted subject to verification and applicable conditions.
Gift Cards cannot be exchanged for cash or credit.
Snapdeal and Pine Labs are not liable for any misuse, theft, or unauthorized use of a Gift Card once issued. Customers are responsible for keeping their Gift Card number and PIN secure. In case of loss or disclosure of these details, no replacement or refund will be provided.
Snapdeal and Pine Labs are not responsible for the quality, warranty, or after-sales service of products purchased using Gift Cards. All product-related liabilities lie with the respective sellers.
Once purchased, Gift Cards cannot be canceled by the buyer. Any exception will be at the discretion of Snapdeal or Pine Labs.
If a Gift Card is found to be purchased through fraudulent means, Snapdeal/Pine Labs reserve the right to cancel it. In such cases, the value will be refunded to the original source of payment.
If the Know Your Customer (KYC) details of the purchaser/beneficiary do not meet RBI requirements or are incorrect, Snapdeal/Pine Labs may cancel the Gift Card.
Gift Cards are regulated instruments under RBI guidelines. Snapdeal/Pine Labs may share KYC or transaction details related to the purchase or redemption of Gift Cards with RBI or other regulatory authorities if required. Purchasers/redeemers may be contacted for such information.
Gift Cards are non-reloadable and cannot be resold.
Any promotional offers, including bank offers or cashback on Gift Cards, are subject to change or withdrawal at the sole discretion of Snapdeal/Pine Labs.
E-Gift Cards are usually delivered instantly via email/SMS. However, in rare cases, delivery may take up to 48–72 hours due to system delays.
Gift Cards are valid and can be redeemed only on Fashion, Home, FMCG, and BPC (Beauty and Personal care) products.
E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 48-72 hours.
No returns and no refunds on gift cards, E- gift cards and gift vouchers shipped bywoohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

description: We believe that when you eat fresh, you think fresh; and we bring this fresh thinking in all our endeavours. Subway is the better choice when it comes to freshly made, convenient food, serving customizable signature sandwiches, wraps and salads to guests every day. As one of the world's largest quick service restaurant brands, today, Subway® has grown to become one of the world's largest restaurant brands, serving customizable and signature sandwiches, wraps and salads to millions of guests, across more than 100 countries in more than 37,000 restaurants every day.

tnc.content:
Gift Card is valid for 6 months from the date of purchase for dine-in transactions only, and the validity of the Gift Card shall not be extended in any event whatsoever.
Gift Card will be in the form of an e-voucher.
Customer should announce usage of e voucher before placing the order.
The Gift card is redeemable only once. Any balance left on the card will be forfeited.
Each individual Gift Card is redeemable solely on a single transaction by the end customers and if such gift card is redeemed partially, balance amount shall be deemed to have been lapsed.
Multiple Gift Cards (i.e. – more than one) cannot be clubbed in a single transaction
If the invoice amount exceeds the value of the gift card, balance must be paid by cash, credit or debit card, UPI or any other acceptable forms of payment.
The value of expired gift cards (post their validity) will not be refunded.
Gift Card’s once expired cannot be used again for any transaction.

Subway® shall not be liable if the gift card cannot be used at any particular restaurant due to technical errors or other such operating system glitches.
The gift card cannot be used to purchase any Subway product on any delivery platform (eg it cannot be used through a delivery app like Zomato, Swiggy, ONDC sellers etc)
Once the invoice is paid and the customer has not provided the details of gift card to be redeemed, the invoice cannot be amended to include the discount and no request for refund will be entertained.
Once a gift card has been purchased, it is considered sold and cannot be cancelled, redeemed for cash, refunded, exchanged or refilled.
No refunds will be entertained for any lost gift cards and no revalidation is allowed for expired gift card balance.
Any invoice , once billed, with a gift card redemption cannot be cancelled. Gift Card will be counted as consumed.
In case of any further queries, customer can reach out to Subway through customercare@subway.in

Every piece in the store is sure to astound you because of their dazzling beauty, fantastic artistry, and sheer variety. If you love the ornaments that add to your personality and make you stand out anywhere, Tanishq Gift Card is ideal for your needs. Tanishq is a Titan Ltd. subsidiary and a prominent brand offer from the famous Tata Group of Industries that recently opened its 150th shop in India. Those who are looking to add to their jewelry collection with a special something in gold can make the most of the Tanishq Gift Card, which opens up a world of loveliness to explore and utilize as you see fit. From simple and elegant designs to elaborate and heavy items, you can choose anything you want to add that elusive glamour quotient.So what are you waiting for, this is too good an opportunity to miss!

description: Bikanervala, a name synonymous today with Indian sweets and snacks, traces its humble beginnings to 1905. The operations started out as a small, sweet shop - Bikaner Namkeen Bhandar in Bikaner's old city area of Kote Gate by Shri Lal Chand Agarwal. The shop initially sold a few sweets and namkeen tuned to tastes of Bikaneris. There it found acceptance and the shop prospered.Having prospered and created a name for itself in Bikaner’s old city area and neighbouring parts of the city, two brothers from the family set out in 1905, to write another chapter in Bikaner Namkeen Bhandar's story. The two brother’s setup shop in Delhi's Chandini Chowk and started selling sweets and namkeen. Using their family recipes which were handed down generation after generation to them, the culinary experience was something the capital had not witnessed before.Today, Bikanervala has more than 100+ outlets in India and has presence outside of India in countries like USA, New Zealand, Singapore, Nepal, and the UAE.

description:
The Body Shop is the world’s leading ethical beauty brand.
Our story started in Brighton, England in 1976, where our founder Dame Anita Roddick began mixing her own products and infusing them with a new idea - that business could be a force for good. Since then, we have searched the world for the finest ethically-sourced ingredients to create our naturally-inspired beauty products. Ranging from Skin care, Bath & Body care, Hair care, Fragrance, Gifting and Make up, our products are 100% Vegetarian and Cruelty Free.
expiry: 1 year from the date of issue
name: The Body Shop E-Gift Cards
shortDescription:
•    Multiple Gift Cards CAN be used in one bill.

•    Gift Cards are at The Body Shop Outlets and their website at https://www.thebodyshop.in/.

•    Gift Cards CAN be clubbed with in store promotions/offers.

tnc.content:
Body Shop E-Gift Vouchers are redeemable at the Body Shop stores and website in India only.
E-Gift Voucher cannot be en-cashed or refunded and can be redeemed only on purchase of the Body Shop products.
The Body Shop E-Gift Vouchers are valid for 12 months from the date of issue.
No cash will be refunded even if the purchase value is less than the voucher value.
Unlimited E-Gift Voucher can be clubbed against single billing.
In case the value of the merchandise exceeds the value of the E-Gift Voucher, the difference must be paid by cash, credit card or debit card.
E-Gift Voucher can-not be redeemed partially.
In case of lost or missing E-vouchers no replacement would be provided.
It is mandatory to present the E-Gift Voucher at the time of purchase/ billing.
E-Gift Vouchers can be used during the sales period.
E-Gift Voucher can be clubbed with existing offers in store.
Any unused balance on the E-Gift Voucher cannot be en-cashed or refunded.
E-Gift Voucher validity cannot be extended /cannot issue new E-Gift Voucher post expiry.

cpg.howToUse:
•    Customer visits any of the TBZ- The Original outlet

•    Informs store team on usage of Gift Card as payment mode

•    Selects merchandise and cashier initiates the process of invoicing

•    Cashier selects gift card as a mode for payment

•    Submits gift card details, system will display available balance

•    Cashier informs the customer about the available balance and asks for redemption

•    On customers confirmation cashier clicks redemption button

•    System validates the card, and the total invoice value gets reduced by the Gift Card Redeemed value

•    Please note entire balance in the gift card must get redeemed in one transaction as partial redemption is not allowed

•    Amount left in the gift card cannot be claimed by the customer, as it gets forfeited

•    In case of the total bill value goes higher than GC Redemption value, customer is requested to make balance amount by opting another mode of payment like credit / debit / wallet or cash to complete the transaction and close the invoice

description:
TBZ – The Original is a brand that is coveted for its promise of innovative designs, exemplary quality of workmanship and trust that spans over 156 years. Our brand has been synonymous with jewellery for weddings, celebrations, and festive occasions as well for everyday wear for young India that has electric taste and seeks jewellery that is aspirational. Our enduring collection of aesthetically designed pieces epitomises the spirit of femininity, elegance, and grace.
Inspired by our legacy and by staying true to the values of trust, quality, and craftsmanship that we have inherited, we have carved a niche for ourselves. We have been at the forefront of designing traditional as well as contemporary collections and are trendsetters setting benchmarks of excellence in all that we do.
Every jewellery piece comes with a buyback guarantee. We were the first in India to promote the concept of lightweight precious jewellery, offer lifetime buyback on gold and diamond jewellery, provide certified solitaire diamonds, and introduce 100% BIS hallmarked 22 karat gold jewellery. Our pioneering focus is also reflected in the overall professional working environment in our Company and is visible in the high standards of corporate, transparency in reporting and ethical business practices we adopt.
expiry: 365 days from the date of activation
name: TBZ Jewellery Retail E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
This E- gift card is valid for 12 month (365 days) from the date of activation.
The maximum amount of E-Gift Card shall not exceed Rs. 50,000/- at any point of time.
This E-gift cards can only be used to purchase product/s at any TBZ-The Original outlet.
This E- gift card can be used only for once within the validity period of 12 months for the entire amount loaded on the E-Gift Card at a time. E-Gift card cannot be redeemed partially. In case if the amount redeemed is lower than the amount loaded on card than the balance amount will lapse and cannot be used.
On expiry of the E-gift card, any unused balance will not be refunded or credited.
This E-gift card will not be replaced or reimbursed the value of your card in case of lost, stolen, damaged or expired
Balance and validity of the gift card can be checked at the cash counter of any TBZ-The Original outlet or visit www.woohoo.in
These Terms & conditions are subject to change anytime without any prior notice

cpg.howToUse:
•    Visit the nearest Toscano outlet.

•    Inform the cashier about the Gift Card before ordering food.

•    Show the Gift Card details to the cashier at the time of billing & pay any balance amount by card or cash.

description: Special moments deserve special gifts, and the finest presents often come in the form of experiences. Give the gift of a truly Italian dining experience with the Toscano Gift Card. It's the perfect way to share your good wishes and love. Our Gift-card can be redeemed at any of our outlets, whether for a cozy Italian meal, or a culinary adventure with our specially crafted menus. Discover a range of exquisite dishes and  wine  collection, immerse yourself in the authentic flavours of Italy. Whatever the occasion, we guarantee you memorable moments and a sensory feast. Elevate the joy of gifting with our gift card, your solution for all your special occasions.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Toscano E-Gift Card
shortDescription:
• The Gift-Card is applicable for Dine-in only.
  • Valid for 12 months from the date of purchase / activation
  • Valid for one time redemption only
  • Valid at all Toscano Restaurants.
  • The guest should present the Gift-Card to the restaurant concierge, at the time of entry, for a seamless experience.

tnc.content:
The Gift-Card is applicable for Dine-in only.
Valid for 12 months from the date of purchase / activation
Valid for one time redemption only
No refunds allowed.
Valid at all Toscano Restaurants.
Government Taxes and Services Charge as applicable.
All disputes are subject to Bangalore jurisdiction only.
To check balance and expiration date of the card please visit: https://www.woohoo.in/balenq
This Gift-Card has been powered by Pine Labs on behalf of Toscano
The guest should present the Gift-Card to the restaurant concierge, at the time of entry, for a seamless experience.
This Gift-Card does not imply confirmation of booking. Prior booking over Toscano’s outlets contact numbers is recommended.
The guest is advised to retain the Gift-Card details safely and share the redemption code responsibly.
The bearer of the Gift-Card shall be considered as the owner of the voucher.
It is not valid for payment of events, wine dinners, chef college or outdoor catering
If the bill exceeds the Gift-Card value, an additional amount needs to be paid by the guest
Toscano Management reserves the right to identify the authenticity of the Gift-Card. In case of any dispute, the restaurant reserves Right to Admission.
In case a restaurant is non-operational due to government restrictions, political unrest, structural safety precautions etc. the guest is requested to make alternate bookings.
For any issues please contact us at contact@toscano.co.in - Mob: +91-7619407979
E-Gift cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 hours.

cpg.howToUse:
•    Gift Cards may only be redeemed toward the purchase of eligible products on www.tatacliq.com

•    Login to Tata Cliq Account click your account

•    Select Cliq Cash option

•    Enter Gift Card Number

•    Enter PIN

•    Click on Add card to wallet to complete the addition of money to Tata Cliq Wallet. While purchasing a product, on the payments page, click on Cliq cash to redeem the balance from the wallet Purchases are deducted from the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance. Any unused CLiQ cash balance will remain associated with the redeemer's tatacliq.com account and applied to purchases in order of earliest expiration date. If a purchase exceeds the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance, the remaining amount must be paid with by credit card, net banking or debit card.

description:
TATA CLiQ: Shop Online with India's most trusted destination. Buy Brands you love at prices you want!
Shop online whenever you want to - yes, that 24x7 experience is so convenient now, isn't it?! Get genuine products from all the Top Brands delivered to your doorstep, with free shipping. Our clean, immersive design allows for easy navigation across categories and brand stores so you can find the best products from a wide range of smartphones, mobile phones, laptops, women's clothing, men's clothing, kids wear, footwear, watches and accessories online. You can also check our great offers or deal of the day section and get the best prices on various products across lifestyle, fashion, electronics, appliances & more. With such offerings and TATA CLiQ exclusive bank offers and TATA CLiQ coupons, do remember to buy mobile online, do online electronics shopping and online dress shopping of top Brands at the best prices available throughout the year.
expiry: 1 year from the date of issue.
name: TATA CLiQ Fashion E-Gift Card-B2C

tnc.content:
• These terms and conditions apply to Tata CLiQ Gift Cards ("Gift Cards") issued by Pine Labs Private Limited ("Pine Labs") under the brand name of “Qwikcilver”. Pine Labs is a private limited company organized under the laws of India, and is the issuer of Giftcards. By purchasing or using a Gift Card, you are agreeing to and accept these terms and conditions
  • Your purchase or use of Gift Card constitutes your agreement to follow and be bound by these terms and conditions, as updated or modified from time to time.

Redemption

  • Gift Cards may only be redeemed toward the purchase of eligible products on www.tatacliq.com. Purchases are deducted from the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance
  • Any unused CLiQ cash balance will remain associated with the redeemer's tatacliq.com account and applied to purchases in order of earliest expiration date
  • If a purchase exceeds the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance, the remaining amount must be paid with by credit card, net banking or debit card. No fees or charges apply to Gift Cards.
  • Pine Labs may provide Gift Card purchasers with information about the redemption status of Gift Cards that they purchase or use
  • Gift Cards, including any unused Gift Card balances, expire one year from the date of issuance
  • Gift Cards may only be purchased in denominations ranging from Rs. 10 to Rs. 10,000, or such other limits as Pine Labs may determine
  • Gift Cards cannot be used to purchase other gift cards. Gift Cards cannot be reloaded, resold, transferred for value or redeemed for cash
  • Gift Cards cannot be redeemed on purchase of bullions
  • Additionally, Gift Cards will not be applicable on purchase of gold jewellery from 20th June 2025 onwards.
  • Unused Gift Card balances associated with an tatacliq.com account may not be transferred to another tatacliq.com account
  • No interest will be payable by Pine Labs on any Gift Card or Gift Card balance. Pine Labs makes no representation or warranty that www.tatacliq.com will always be accessible without interruption.

How To Use:

  • Gift Cards may only be redeemed toward the purchase of eligible products on www.tatacliq.com
  • Login to Tata Cliq Account click your account
  • Select Cliq Cash option
  • Enter Gift Card Number
  • Enter PIN
  • Click on Add card to wallet to complete the addition of money to Tata Cliq Wallet.

While purchasing a product, on the payments page, click on Cliq cash to redeem the balance from the wallet

Purchases are deducted from the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance.

Any unused CLiQ cash balance will remain associated with the redeemer's tatacliq.com account and applied to purchases in order of earliest expiration date.

If a purchase exceeds the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance, the remaining amount must be paid with by credit card, net banking or debit card.

description: Taneira is the latest brand addition from Titan group, which aims to revive one of the oldest occupations in our country – handloom weaving and the oldest garment, the saree. They aim to provide authentic, natural materials, handwoven sarees and celebrate Indian craftsmanship, heritage and exclusive designs
expiry: 6 Months from the Date of Activation
name: Taneira E-Gift card
shortDescription:
•    Gift card is not a credit card and has no value until activated at Taneira stores or website.

•    Gift card cannot be redeemed for cash or refunded for unused balance.

•    Present this card at the billing desk for purchases or reloading.

tnc.content:
This card is the property of Titan Company Limited, to whom it should be returned upon request.
This is not a credit card. This card holds no value unless activated at Taneira stores/Taneira website.
This card is redeemable on purchase of products at any Taneira store.
This card can neither be redeemed for cash, nor can any unutilised balance be refunded.
This card is reloadable for any amount and the amount loaded on the card shall be valid for 180 days from the date of loading/reloading.
This card has to be presented at the billing desk to use for billing of products or for reloading.
If this card is damaged, lost or stolen, it will not be issued again nor will any cash be refunded.
Charge slip issued at the time of loading, reloading or redemption of the card will show the remaining card balance and validity
E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 hours.
No returns and no refunds on gift cards, E- gift cards and gift vouchers shipped by woohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

cpg.howToUse:
•    Walk in-to Tanishq store.

•    Select the applicable Tanishq product, based on the Gift card type (refer terms & conditions).

•    At the Billing Counter, inform the cashier about the choice of making payment using Gift Cards.

•    Cashier selects Gift Card as payment mode, submits Gift Card & PIN details in the system and completes the billing process.

description:
Tanishq is a name synonymous with superior craftsmenship, exclusive designs and superlative product quality. A journey that started with a launch of 18k gold watches studded with precious stones, Tanishq soon grew into a 22k gold jeweller who understood the evolving needs and desires of the Indian women. A blend of traditional values coupled with a modern outlook made us India’s first and largest jewellery retail store chain and allow us to maintain our position as the top Indian
jewellery brand. At Tanishq, jewellery is not a product, but rather a manifestation of artistry and this is why we are a brand that has the distinct honour of being coveted by Indian women.

Everything that Glitters is Gold with Tanishq Gift Card. Tanishq is a brand name that inspires confidence among buyers. This store houses exquisite precious metal jewelry that uses precious and semi precious stones including diamonds. People purchase at Tanishq because this is a name, they trust. You can go for eighteen to twenty two carat gold jewelry along with ornaments designed from platinum. Every
piece in the store is sure to astound you because of their dazzling beauty, fantastic artistry, and sheer variety. If you love the ornaments that add to your personality and make you stand out anywhere, Tanishq Gift Card is ideal for your needs. Tanishq is a Titan Ltd. subsidiary and a prominent brand offer from the famous Tata Group of Industries that recently opened its 150th shop in India. Those who are looking to add
to their jewelry collection with a special something in gold can make the most of the Tanishq Gift Card, which opens up a world of loveliness to explore and utilize as you see fit. From simple and elegant designs to elaborate and heavy items, you can choose anything you want to add that elusive glamour quotient.So what are you waiting for, this is too good an opportunity to miss!
expiry: 6 months from the date of issue
name: Tanishq Studded E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
This e-Gift card is activated once issued.
This e-Gift Card is valid for 180 days (6 months) from the date of activation/issuance and it can not be further re-validated.
This e-Gift card is valid on Studded jewellery and is not valid gold coins, at the participating Tanishq Showrooms in India. For list of stores visit - https://stores.tanishq.co.in/
This e-Gift card is allowed for one-time redemption only.
Any unused balance on the e-Gift card will not be refunded or credited.
Balance / expiry may be checked at the Tanishq cash counters.
Tanishq will not replace or reimburse the value of your e-Gift card if it is lost, stolen, or expired.
This e-Gift Card is non-encashable.
Bearer is responsible if an e-Gift Card is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission. • For this e-Gift Card, Indian law is applicable and jurisdiction shall be Bangalore.
These terms & conditions are subject to change at any time, without any prior notice.
This e Gift card is only entitlement to credit to the extent of the load value of the Gift card and is non- encashable.
If the value of the purchase is less than the value of the Gift card, the balance is non-refundable.
For Balance & Expiry Check, SMS - TNQBAL to 8861208222
This Gift card is not a legal tender.

•    Walk in-to Tanishq store.

•    Select the applicable Tanishq product, based on the Gift card type (refer terms & conditions).

•    At the Billing Counter, inform the cashier about the choice of making payment using Gift Cards.

•    Cashier selects Gift Card as payment mode, submits Gift Card & PIN details in the system and completes the billing process.

tnc.content:
This Gift Card, issued by Pine Labs Pvt Ltd and is usable at Uber. The Gift cards are issued under the brand name of “Qwikcilver”.
This Gift Card Agreement (“Agreement”) is between the purchaser and/or redeemer (“you”) of the Gift Card (“Gift Card”), and Pine Labs Pvt. Ltd. ("Pine Labs" or “Issuer”), a private limited company incorporated under the laws of India and authorized by the Reserve Bank of India ("RBI") to issue such Gift Cards. By purchasing and/or redeeming the Gift Card, you accept the following terms and conditions:
You must have an active and valid Uber account to redeem the Gift Card. Gift Cards may be purchased online from authorized distributors using the following payment modes only - credit card, debit card and internet banking provided by banks in India. The Gift Card cannot be used outside of India.
Valid for a period of 12 months from the date of activation and shall expire if not availed within the validity period.
Please follow these steps to redeem the Gift Card in the Uber app:
1. Go to the payment section in the Uber app;
2. Tap the menu icon and select "Payment”;
3. Tap "Add Payment Method" and select "Gift Card"; and
4. Enter your gift code (no spaces).
5. The cardholder may request for the revalidation of the expired Gift Card. Upon receipt of such request the Gift Card may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions.
For balance inquiry, please visit the payments section in your Uber app. Limits may apply to your redemption of or spend using the Gift Card.
If you have other payment methods in your Uber account, value from the Gift Card may be set as your default payment method. If you wish to use another payment method, go to the payment section in the Uber app and select the payment method before the service is provided. The Gift Card cannot be reloaded with additional funds after purchase. Once purchased, the Gift Card cannot be cancelled by the purchaser, nor is the Gift Card refundable, returnable or redeemable for cash or credit, except where required by law. Any cancellations shall be at the sole discretion of Uber/Pine Labs. You cannot purchase other Gift Cards with the Gift Card, nor can you use the Gift Card to make a payment on a credit account. The Gift Card balance cannot be transferred to any other instrument. Purchases made with value from the Gift Card are not refundable, except where required by law. Issuer assumes no responsibility for the products purchased using the Gift Cards and any liability thereof is expressly disclaimed. For questions, please contact Uber Support. Neither Uber nor Pine Labs is providing any transportation or logistic services upon usage of the Gift Card and the transportation or logistic services are provided by third party transportation/logistic providers. Neither Uber nor Pine Labs commits to availability of transportation or logistic services in India.
You are solely responsible for the safety and security of the Gift Card. Issuer / Uber is not responsible for any acts of omission or commission if Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission. Once the Gift Card has been sent to you, you are bound to protect the Gift Card PIN or Gift Card number as confidential. IN THE EVENT THAT A GIFT CARD IS NON-FUNCTIONAL, YOUR SOLE REMEDY (AND PINE LABS’ / UBER’S SOLE POTENTIAL LIABILITY) SHALL BE THE REPLACEMENT OF SUCH GIFT CARD.
Issuer reserves the right to void the Gift Card if the Issuer / Uber suspects that the Gift Card was obtained or used fraudulently, unlawfully or otherwise in violation of this Agreement. Issuer / Uber may modify any of this Agreement’s terms and conditions at any time. Redemption of the Gift Card is also subject to the terms of use governing your Uber account. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received.
You agree and understand that Gift Cards are a pre-paid payment instrument subjected to regulations by the RBI under the RBI guidelines. Issuer may be required to share KYC details of the purchaser/ redeemer of the Gift Card and/or any other information with relation to the purchase of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Card with RBI or such statutory authorities. Uber/ Pine Labs may contact the purchaser/redeemer of the Gift Card for any such information. In the event that the beneficiary/know your customer ("KYC") details as per RBI guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient, Issuer retains the right to block/cancel the Gift Card issued.
If any term of this Agreement is deemed to be invalid, void or for any reason unenforceable, such term shall be deemed severable and will not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining terms of this Agreement. For customer service, please visit uber.com/legal/gift.
Process for loading Gift Card value into User’s Uber Account - Every holder of Gift Cards shall be required to insert the claim code of the Gift Card into their Uber User Account as a pre-requisite to the redemption of the Gift Cards. This will entitle such holder to redeem the value of such claim code against services on the Uber app/website.
Uber shall honour and consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from users who have registered in accordance with the terms above.
Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at htps://www.qwikcilver.com/grievance-policy/
GOVERNING LAW AND JURISDICTION
This Agreement shall be exclusively governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, excluding its rules on conflicts of laws. To the extent permitted by law, any claim, dispute, or controversy (“Claim”) arising out of or relating in any way to: i) this Agreement; ii) the Gift Card; iii) your acquisition of the Gift Card; iv) your redemption of the Gift Card for use, or attempted use, within the Uber app; v) the amount of available funds on the Gift Card; or vi) advertisements, promotions or oral or written statements related to the Gift Card; no matter how described, pleaded or styled, shall be subject to the laws of India and the courts in Delhi / Bangalore shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
This governing law and jurisdiction provision shall survive: i) the termination of this Agreement; ii) the bankruptcy of any party; or iii) any transfer, sale or assignment of the Gift Card, or any amounts owed on the Gift Card, to any other person or entity. If any portion of this provision is deemed invalid or unenforceable, the remaining portions shall remain in force.
HOW TO ADD UBER GIFT CARDS to the Uber APP
Gift Cards apply Uber credits to an Uber account. To redeem a Gift Card:
1. Make sure you have the latest version of the Uber app
2. Tap the menu icon and select "Payment"
3. Tap "Add Payment Method" and select "Gift Card"
4. Enter your gift code (no spaces)
Once a Gift Card is added to an Uber account, it can't be transferred. You can't reload a Gift Card, but you can add as many gift cards as you like with each up to a maximum of Rs 10,000.
HOW TO USE UBER GIFT CARDS
Gift Card credits will apply to your next trip or order by default, but you can select a different payment method before you make your request:
1. Enter your destination
2. Tap the payment method info at the bottom of the next screen
3. If you have more than one profile, tap "Change payment method"
4. Toggle "Uber Credits" to turn them off (credits will be turned off only for that ride)
If your credits aren't completely used up, the remaining balance can be applied to your next ride or order.
An authorization may be made on that payment method, but it will be voided once the Gift Card is charged.
No fees or charges apply to Gift Cards.
By purchasing this gift voucher, you consent to sharing your PII ( Name, Email ID, Telephone Number if available ) with the issuer ( PineLabs ), as per the guidelines of PPI.

description: Wrangler is the everyday performance denim brand. Since the dawn of our denim, our inspiration and guide has been real life experiences. We believe that clothing should be designed to fit the needs of the people wearing it.We have held this belief to our heart from the beginning — from 1947 , when we started up in Greensboro, North Carolina. We embarked on a platform of innovation and with an idea to create the best-possible jeans, jackets and shirts for cowboys. We added special features. We added functionality. For instance, flat rivets that wouldn’t scratch your saddle, watch pockets, seven belt loops (instead of the usual five), and yoke seam over panel for keeping your wallet in place. Functional design details still remain vital, adapting to modern looks and needs.

tnc.content:
Zomato gift cards (each a “Gift Card”) are issued by Pinelabs Private Limited (“Pinelabs”), a private limited company incorporated under the laws of India, and is authorized by the Reserve Bank of India ('RBI') under the Master Directions on Prepaid Payment Instruments (“PPI Master Directions”) to issue gift cards with Zomato Limited (“Zomato”) as the co-branding partner.
By purchasing the Gift Card on the Zomato Platform (as defined below), using or redeeming a Gift Card, the User is agreeing to accept and to be bound by these terms and conditions, as updated or modified from time to time.
The Gift Card bears a 16-digit electronic PPI number along with a 6-digit pin.
The Gift Cards can be redeemed towards the purchase of eligible products only on the Zomato website and mobile application (“Zomato Platform”).
Once the Gift Card is purchased, the User cannot cancel it, return it, seek a refund for it or redeem the Gift Card for cash or credit, except where required by applicable laws.
As a pre-requisite to redeeming the Gift Card, the User will be required to add the value stored on this Gift Card into their valid account on the Zomato Platform ("Zomato Account"). The loading of the Gift Card onto the Zomato Platform shall constitute a registration of the User with Pinelabs.
The balance in the Zomato Account shall be deducted when the User makes purchases on the Platform.
The Gift Card can be combined with promotional codes and with other digital payment options, at Zomato’s or its affiliate’s discretion.
The Gift Card cannot be used to purchase other gift cards.
The Gift Card cannot be reloaded or redeemed for cash.
The unused Gift Card balances associated with a Zomato Account cannot be transferred to another Zomato Account.
The Gift Cards may only be purchased in denominations ranging from INR 100 to INR 10,000, or such other limits as Pinelabs/Zomato may determine.
In case of multiple Gift Cards being loaded to a User’s Zomato Account, the Gift Cards having the earliest expiration date will be applied to the User’s purchases on the Platform first.
There is no fee or other charges associated with the Gift Card purchase on the Zomato Platform.
No interest will be payable by Pinelabs on any Gift Card or Gift Card balance.
The Gift Card is valid for a period of 1 (one) year from the date of activation of the Gift Card.
The Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. However, there may be delays in the system upto seventy-two (72) hours.
Credit and debit cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase a Gift Card.
Gift Card usage information shall be available on Zomato Platform to the User.
While redeeming the Gift Cards, if the User’s purchase on the Zomato Platform exceeds the balance in the User Zomato Account, the remaining amount must be paid by the User through credit card, net banking, debit card or other digital payment methods available on thePlatform.
The User agrees and understands that the Gift Card is a prepaid payment instrument regulated by the RBI. Under the applicable laws, Zomato / Pinelabs may be required to share the details of the Gift Card purchaser/ redeemer and/or any other information in relation to the redemption of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Cards, with RBI or other governmental/ statutory authorities. Zomato/ Pinelabs may contact the purchaser/ redeemer (as the case may be) of the Gift Cards for any such information. By registering the Zomato Gift Cards, the User explicitly gives their permission for the usage of their personal information to comply with RBI guidelines and regulations.
The User agrees to provide truthful and accurate information during the purchase of Gift Cards. Zomato may contact the User for further information and documents from the User to comply with KYC and anti-money laundering guidelines issued by RBI from time to time.
Zomato reserves the right to change the Gift Cards terms and conditions from time to time at its discretion and without prior notice to the User.
If the Gift Card is non-functional, the User’s sole remedy (and Pinelabs/ Zomato’s sole potential liability) shall be the replacement of such Gift Card, for the value remaining in the non-functional Gift Card.
Zomato shall consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from Users who have registered in accordance with the terms above.
Any cancellations shall be at the sole discretion of Zomato.
Zomato reserves the right to deny accepting any Gift Card if it suspects that there is duplicity of Gift Card.
Zomato reserves the right to void the Gift Card, close customer accounts and take payment from alternative forms of payment if (a) a fraudulently or unlawfully obtained Gift Card is redeemed and/or used to make purchases on the Zomato Platform, and/or (b) the beneficiary/KYC details as per RBI guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received from.
Fraudulent/unlawful/misuse of Gift Card shall result in cancellation of order, which has been made using the Gift Card without any liability of Zomato.
In case of any cancellation of orders purchased using Gift Cards, the amount will be added to the User’s Gift Cards balance.
The User is solely responsible for the safety and security of the Gift Card. Further, once the Gift Card has been sent to the User, the User is bound to protect the Gift Card’s 16 digit code and 6 digit PIN as the same constitutes confidential information. Zomato/Pinelabs shall not be responsible to provide new Gift Cards in the event (a) this confidentiality obligation is breached by the User, or (b) Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission or unlawfully.
User agrees to indemnify Zomato/ its Affiliate, officers, directors, from all claims brought by any third party against Zomato/ its affiliates, officers, directors, arising out of or in connection with any breach of these Terms.
Zomato does not warrant that the services and products provided to the User pursuant to these terms and conditions will be free of interruptions, errors, bugs, viruses, or security problems.
Neither Pinelabs nor Zomato makes any warranties, express or implied, with respect to Gift Cars including without limitation, any express or implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.
Zomato makes no representation or warranty that the Platform will always be accessible without interruption.
In no event shall the liability of Zomato for any claims arising by the purchase or usage of Gift Cards exceed the value of the respective Gift Card.
The User may write to giftcards@zomato.com for any support with regards to usage of the Gift Cards.
Pinelabs contact Information. customer support: 080-64534440 | Email: gcsupport.woohoo@pinelabs.com Website address: www.pinelabs.com
Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.pinelabs.com/grievance-policy
The courts at New Delhi shall have exclusive jurisdiction for any disputes arising in relation to Gift Cards.

This Gift Card can be used on Zepto Platform (website and mobile application of www.zeptonow.com) towards the purchase of products and services listed on the platform. This Gift card is subject to terms and conditions. Zepto Gift Cards bring incredible savings on groceries, dairy products, kitchen staples, fresh vegetables, fruits, packed food, stationary, makeup, personal care, electronic appliances, clothing, and more.
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Zepto B2C E-Gift Card

tnc.content:
• This Gift Card, issued by Pine Labs Limited (formerly known as Pine Labs Private Limited), is usable at Zepto and issued under the name of “Zepto Gift Card”.
  • This Gift Card Agreement (“Agreement”) is between the purchaser and/or redeemer (“you”) of the Gift Card (“Gift Card”), and Pine Labs Limited (“Pine Labs” or “Issuer”), a limited company incorporated under the laws of India and authorized by the Reserve Bank of India (“RBI”) to issue such Gift Cards.
  • View your Gift Card transaction statement –  https://bit.ly/zeptoclaim
  • By purchasing and/or redeeming the Gift Card, you accept the following terms and conditions:
  • You must have an active and valid Zepto account to redeem the Gift Card. Gift Cards may be purchased online from authorized distributors using the following payment modes only – credit card, debit card and internet banking provided by banks in India.
  • You will only be able to redeem the Gift Card if you provide/update valid name, surname, and mobile number with Zepto.
  • The Gift Card cannot be used outside of India. Valid for a period of 12 months from the date of activation. The cardholder may request for revalidation of the expired Gift Card. Upon receipt of such request the Gift Card may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions
  • The Gift Cards can be redeemed online on website www.zeptonow.com and Zepto mobile application (website and mobile application known as “Zepto Platform”)
  • Please follow these steps to redeem the Gift Card in the Zepto Platform:
    • Login to Zepto Platform
    • Click on My Profile / Settings
    • Go to Zepto Cash & Gift Card
    • Click on “Add Card” option to add the Gift card
    • Enter 16-digit Card Number and 6-digit PIN and Submit
  • For balance inquiry, please visit the payments section in your app.
  • Limits may apply to your redemption of or spend using the Gift Card. If you have other payment methods in your Zepto account, value from the Gift Card may be set as your default payment method. If you wish to use another payment method, go to the payment section in the Zepto app and select the payment method before the service is provided.
  • The Gift Card cannot be reloaded with additional funds after purchase. Once purchased, the Gift Card cannot be cancelled by the purchaser, nor is the Gift Card refundable, transferable or returnable or redeemable for cash or credit, except where required by law.
  • Gift Cards cannot be resold.
  • Any cancellations shall be at the sole discretion of Zepto/Pine Labs. You cannot purchase other Gift Cards with the Gift Card, nor can you use the Gift Card to make a payment on a credit account.
  • The Gift Card balance cannot be transferred to any other instrument. Purchases made with value from the Gift Card are not refundable, except where required by law.
  • Issuer assumes no responsibility for the products purchased using the Gift Cards and any liability thereof is expressly disclaimed.
  • You are solely responsible for the safety and security of the Gift Card. Issuer / Zepto is not responsible for any acts of omission or commission if Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission.
  • Once the Gift Card has been sent to you, you are bound to protect the Gift Card PIN or Gift Card number as confidential. IN THE EVENT THAT A GIFT CARD IS NON-FUNCTIONAL, YOUR SOLE REMEDY (AND PINE LABS’ / ZEPTO’s SOLE POTENTIAL LIABILITY) SHALL BE THE REPLACEMENT OF SUCH GIFT CARD.
  • Issuer reserves the right to void the Gift Card if the Issuer / Zepto suspects that the Gift Card was obtained or used fraudulently, unlawfully or otherwise in violation of this Agreement. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received
  • Issuer / Zepto may modify any of this Agreement’s terms and conditions at any time.
  • Redemption of the Gift Card is also subject to the Terms Of Use governing your Zepto account.
  • You agree and understand that Gift Cards are a pre-paid payment instrument subjected to regulations by the RBI under the RBI guidelines.
  • Issuer may be required to share KYC details of the purchaser/ redeemer of the Gift Card and/or any other information with relation to the purchase of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Card with RBI or such statutory authorities.
  • Zepto/ Pine Labs may contact the purchaser/redeemer of the Gift Card for any such information.
  • In the event that the beneficiary/know your customer (“KYC”) details as per RBI guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient, Issuer retains the right to block/cancel the Gift Card issued.
  • If the order value exceeds the Gift Card amount, the balance must be paid by Credit Card/Debit Card/Internet Banking/UPI or other valid payment options.
  • If the order value is less than the amount of the Gift Card, the outstanding balance (after deduction of order value) can be used for subsequent transactions subject to validity of the Gift Card.
  • The value of each Gift Card shall not exceed INR 10000 (Rupees Ten Thousand only) and the aggregated value of all such Gift Cards per user per month shall not exceed INR 500000 (Rupees Five Lacs Only).
  • The Users may not be able to utilise the Gift Card for certain products including tobacco, precious metals and such other products or categories as may be determined by Zepto and/or its sellers from time to time. The Users are requested to check the Zepto Platform at all times before completing their purchases.
  • Similarly Zepto may place purchase or redemption restrictions on certain Users or User cohorts for Zepto Platform safety and integrity.
  • If any term of this Agreement is deemed to be invalid, void or for any reason unenforceable, such term shall be deemed severable and will not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining terms of this Agreement.
  • For customer service, please contact or visit  support@zeptonow.com
  • Every holder of Gift Cards shall be required to add Gift Card into their Zepto User Account as a pre-requisite to the redemption of the Gift Cards. This will entitle such holder to redeem the value against products and services on the Zepto Platform. Zepto shall honour and consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from users who have registered in accordance with the terms above. Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.pinelabs.com/grievance-policy
  • This Agreement shall be exclusively governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, excluding its rules on conflicts of laws. To the extent permitted by law, any claim, dispute, or controversy (“Claim”) arising out of or relating in any way to: i) this Agreement; ii) the Gift Card; iii) your acquisition of the Gift Card; iv) your redemption of the Gift Card for use, or attempted use, within the Zepto app; v) the amount of available funds on the Gift Card; or vi) advertisements, promotions or oral or written statements related to the Gift Card; no matter how described, pleaded or styled, shall be subject to the laws of India and the courts in Bangalore shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
  • This governing law and jurisdiction provision shall survive: i) the termination of this Agreement; ii) the bankruptcy of any party; or iii) any transfer, sale or assignment of the Gift Card, or any amounts owed on the Gift Card, to any other person or entity. If any portion of this provision is deemed invalid or unenforceable, the remaining portions shall remain in force.
  • E-Gift Cards are usually delivered instantly, but may be delayed up to 24 hours.
  • No returns and no refunds on gift cards, E- gift cards and gift vouchers shipped by woohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at https://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

shortDescription:
