•Clubbing and Partial Redemption are not allowed. No refunds/credit notes shall be issued for unused parts of the Gift card.

tnc.content:
This Gift card is redeemable Online only at Bagline.com across all Products and Brands
The E-Gift card is emailed to the recipient within 24 hours of purchase.
Partial Redemption and Clubbing is not allowed.
The E-Gift card doesn’t come in a physical format. In case the value of the merchandise exceeds the value of the e-gift card, the difference shall be paid by the bearer.
No refunds/credit notes shall be issued for unused parts of the E-Gift card. Protect the E-Gift card number to avoid misuse.
Bagline shall not assume any liability in case the E-gift card gets stolen/compromised, Bagline shall neither replace the E-Gift Card nor refund cash.
Bagline reserves the right to alter any / all the terms and conditions of this E-Gift card at any time without prior notice.
E-Gift cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 hours.

cpg.howToUse:
Select the flights you are interested in on the Air India website or Air India mobile app.
Enter the Gift Card number and pin after completing the purchase of a Gift Card.
If the booking amount equals or exceeds the available credit on the Gift Card, the Gift Card will be fully used until it has no remaining value.
If your Gift Card amount is lower than the booking amount, you can make up the difference by paying the additional amount using any credit card accepted by Air India on the Air India website or mobile app. Gift Card cannot be clubbed with any other form of payment if redemption is being done through the Air India Contact Centre.

description: Air India gift card (“Gift Card”) is a digital card. It can be used to pay for Air India flight tickets and additional products or services offered by Air India on Air India website and Air India mobile app, except for travel insurance and upgrades. Please note that the Gift Cards cannot be used to purchase goods and/or services offered by third parties other than Air India.
expiry: 180 Days from the date of activation
name: Air India E-Gift Voucher

tnc.content:
"Air India is the issuer and redeeming entity for Gift Cards.
Gift Cards can be purchased only through the Platform. Gift Cards can be purchased and redeemed only in Indian currency (INR).
Gift Cards can be purchased using credit card or debit card.
Gift Cards are valid until the date mentioned on the Gift Cards. The validity of a Gift Card cannot be extended under any circumstances. You understand that you will not be compensated in any manner for any lapsed or unused amount under a Gift Card.
Gift Cards can be used to buy Air India tickets and ancillary products on the Air India website and mobile app and cannot be used to avail travel insurance, upgrades or any goods and/or services offered by any third party other than Air India.
Gift Cards are fully transferable but cannot be resold. Any unlawful resale or attempted resale is grounds for seizure and cancellation of the Gift Card without compensation.
Gift Cards cannot be redeemed through any offline channel, such as airport ticketing centre.
Gift Cards cannot be redeemed for group travel.
Gift Cards are for individual use only. If travel agents are found purchasing or using the Gift Card, the booking will be cancelled, and no refund will be issued.
In case of a transaction failure, while making the payment through an Air India Gift Card, the amount will be automatically refunded to the same Gift Card balance within twenty-four (24) hours of failure of such transaction.
A Gift Card can be combined with any offer, such as a discount, cash back, or promotion, offered on Air India’s website, www.airindia.com.
Other modes of payment like credit cards can be used along with the redemption of the Gift Cards but limited to the Air India website and mobile app.
Gift Cards may be valid for both full and partial redemption depending on the Gift Card. Some Gift Cards can be redeemed only once, while others can be redeemed multiple times until the balance goes to zero. In case the value of the purchase exceeds the value of the Gift Card, the difference shall be paid by you. In case of partial redemption, the balance amount remains in the Gift Card until the validity period, which can be used for future transactions. No refunds or credit notes shall be issued for the unused part of the Gift Card.
Multiple Gift Cards (up to a maximum of three (3)) can be combined and used in a single transaction.
A Gift Card, once issued, cannot be refunded, cancelled, or exchanged for cash.
Air India will not be responsible if the Gift Card is used without permission and you are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of all details provided to you in relation to a Gift Card. You understand that we may choose to withdraw, amend, replace, extend, suspend, limit, or cancel any Gift Card at any time at our sole discretion, without any notice and liability to you.
You understand and acknowledge that while Air India issues Gift Cards to you, the issue of Gift Cards shall in no way mean, imply, or denote a promise or commitment for the assured provision of services or products.
To the fullest extent permitted under applicable law, the Gift Card, Platform and other related products, information, materials, and services provided by Air India are provided on an """"as is"""" and “as available” basis. To the fullest extent permitted under applicable law, Air India disclaims all warranties of any kind, express or implied, arising out of the Platform and the use of the Gift Cards, including merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, and noninfringement, and all warranties arising from course of dealing, usage, or trade practice in respect to the same. Without limiting the foregoing, Air India makes no warranty of any kind that the Gift Cards, Platform, or any related products or results of the use thereof, will meet your or any other persons' requirements, operate without interruption, achieve any intended result, be compatible or work with any software, systems, or other services, be secure, accurate, complete, free of harmful code or error-free.
You acknowledge and agree that in the event a Gift Card is non-functional, your sole remedy will be the issuance of another Gift Card, for the value remaining in the non-functional Gift Card.
You agree and acknowledge that neither Air India nor any of its affiliates will be liable for any loss or damage that you or any third-party may suffer or incur which is suffered due to the use of a Gift Card in the event such loss or damage is not attributable to Air India, including but not limited to any loss or damage arising out of or due to: (a) your failure to maintain confidentiality of the details pertaining to a Gift Card or your account with Air India; (b) your failure to provide correct, complete or accurate information or data to avail the Gift Card; (c) your use or inability to use, or availability or unavailability of the Gift Card or the Platform, including any third party services; and (d) the occurrence or existence of any defect, interruption, or delays in the operation or transmission of information to, from, or through the Gift Card or the Platform, communication failure, theft, destruction, or unauthorised access to Air India’s records, programmes, services, servers, or other infrastructure relating to the Gift Card or the Platform.
In case of cancellation of purchase made using the Gift Card within the validity period, the amount deducted from the Gift Card will be reversed to the same Gift Card which was used at the time of making the respective purchase.
In case of cancellations where the Gift Card validity has already expired at the time of initiation of the cancellation process or at the time of processing a refund, no refund will be processed for the amount paid through the expired Gift Card.
In the event an amount is refunded to the Gift Card, users must save the Gift Card number and pin code to utilise this refunded amount under the Gift Card as Air India cannot reissue a new Gift Card number.
Air India reserves the right to modify these Gift Card Terms at its discretion. Such modifications will be updated by Air India on the Platform.
Air India reserves the right to deactivate, suspend, hold for review, cancel any Gift Card, or refuse to accept any Gift Card if it suspects that there is a duplicity of cards, the Gift Card was procured using fraudulent means, for any other violation of the Gift Card Terms or if so considered necessary by Air India in its sole discretion.
You shall indemnify, defend and hold Air India, its affiliates, and their officers, associates, successors, assigns, licensors, employees, directors, agents, and representatives, harmless from and against any direct or indirect losses, actions, damages, penalties, cost and expenses, claim, demand, lawsuits, a judicial proceeding, (including, without limitation, from all damages, liabilities, settlements, costs, and attorney's fees) arising from or relating to:
any act, commission or omission, error, misrepresentation, misconduct, negligence, fraud, forgery, dishonesty, violation attributable to you and/or your personnel/agents/representatives, or any third party who may use your account, your access to the Platform and use of the Gift Cards, and your use of the Platform and the Gift Cards in violation of these Gift Card Terms;
contravention of any applicable law; and
any claim from any authority or any third party as a result of any action or inaction on your part, including but not limited to a breach of these Gift Card Terms or any acts committed beyond the scope of these Gift Card Terms.
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, neither Air India nor any of its affiliates or related parties shall have any liability to you or any third party for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages or any loss of revenue or profits arising under, directly or indirectly, or relating, in any manner whatsoever, to these Gift Card Terms, including any action taken by any authority.
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary, Air India’s maximum aggregate liability to you under the Gift Card Terms or otherwise for any loss in connection with the Platform or the Gift Card shall be limited to the value of the Gift Card.
These Gift Card Terms shall be construed by and governed in accordance with the laws of India, and the courts of Delhi shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with them.
Any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with or relating to these Gift Card Terms or their breach, termination, or invalidity hereof shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration in Delhi in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996 for the time being in force, which rules are deemed to be incorporated by reference in this paragraph.
Within thirty (30) days of the issue of a notice of dispute, Air India and you shall mutually agree on the appointment of a sole arbitrator. If such mutual agreement is not arrived at within the aforesaid thirty (30) days period, Air India and you shall appoint such sole arbitrator in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996.
The seat of arbitration shall be Delhi and the arbitration proceedings shall be conducted in the English language.
Air India/You agree to keep the arbitration confidential and not disclose to any person, other than those necessary to the proceedings, any information, transcripts, or awards unless required by applicable law. The decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding on us/you hereto.
Air India/You hereto agree that our/your consent for the resolution of the dispute through arbitration shall not preclude or restrain you/us from seeking suitable injunctive relief in appropriate circumstances from courts in Delhi.
The cost of arbitration shall be borne in a manner by us/you as determined by the arbitrators. In the meantime, Air India/you shall bear Air India’s/your own cost for the arbitration which shall be reimbursed as per the directions in the arbitral award.
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary, nothing in these Gift Card Terms shall preclude any of your rights under applicable laws.
If you have any questions or complaints with regard to the Gift Card being offered or the Gift Card Terms, you may contact our call centre at 0116 932 9333, 0116 932 9999, 1860 233 1407."""

cpg.howToUse:
•    Visit Apollo Pharmacy to redeem the E-Healing Gift Card

•    Share the E-Healing Gift Card details with the Cashier at the time of payment

•    Cashier to use Billing Code (5000 Healing Card) to redeem the 16 Digit Card No and its Pin No.

•    Please call Apollo Pharmacy Customer Care 1860 500 0101 for any issues

description:
Asia’s largest Pharmacy chain – Apollo Pharmacy, is part of the esteemed healthcare group, Apollo Hospitals. With over 3,500 stores across the country offering genuine medicines, it’s also India’s first 24-hr pharmacy chain with a dedicated staff of over 21,000 people. Accredited with International Quality Certification, quality is the cornerstone of the pharmacy’s existence. With experience in pharmacy operations management for over 2 decades Apollo Pharmacy is committed to delivering the best service in the industry. 
Home to over 5,000 products in various categories - Vitamins and Supplements, Baby care, Personal care, Health foods and OTC and a range of more than 400 Apollo branded products. One of the first and few pharmacies in India to offer vitamins and supplements from UK’s leading brand Holland & Barrett  , www.hollandandbarrettindia.com . Further, what has contributed to the pharmacy’s success are its customer focussed features - prescription refill reminders, card swipe facility at the doorstep, and free home delivery among others.  
Apollo Pharmacy is constantly working towards bettering the lives of its customers. The result – over 10 million happy and loyal customers.
expiry: 6 Months from the date of issue
name: Apollo Healing E-Gift Card
shortDescription:
•    Only one Gift Cards may be applied per transaction.

•    Gift Cards are accepted exclusively at designated Apollo Pharmacy outlets.

•    Gift Cards can be combined with selected in-store promotions and offers.

•    Gift Cards are not valid for online use.

tnc.content:
This is an Apollo Pharmacy E-Healing Card and is only accepted at Apollo Pharmacy retail outlets and not applicable at Apollo 24/7 on Web / 247 App, Apollo Pharmacy website or Hospital Based Pharmacies.
Customer can redeem only 2 (Two) e-cards / day at the participating Apollo Pharmacy retail outlets.
The person who has the Apollo Pharmacy E-Healing Card is deemed to be the beneficiary.
Apollo Pharmacy is not responsible if the Gift Card is lost, stolen, or used without permission.
Request the cashier to use Billing Code (6619 E-Healing Card) to redeem this 16-digit Card No and its Pin No. Call Apollo Pharmacy Customer Care 1860 500 0101 for any issues while redeeming.
Queries while redemption only should be directed to Apollo customer care (1860 500 0101). For further issues, customers must contact the issuer, whose details should be mentioned on the voucher or card.
This is a One-time use E-Healing Card with an expiration date.
No credit note / refund for the unused balance amount of the E-Healing Card will be given. Any such unused balance amount shall stand lapsed automatically.
E-Healing Card validity is decided by the issuer.

description:
Gift an Experience with a BookMyShow E-Gift Card
Love movies, music concerts, standup comedy shows? Have many friends who love them too, just as you do? Then your gifting problems got solved just now. Don’t bother picking up another inane pen holder or wallet. Surprise your friends with something they did not expect. A movie, dance or standup comedy show experience as a gift; that’s something out of the blue, and it’ll be a talking point in your friends’ circle forever. Go on, set the trend, and we’ll help you do it in style. You’ve heard of gifting movie experiences before, but did you know that you can now make a gift of a plethora of experiences to your friends? Bookmyshow has a wide range of shows that you can choose from – standup comedy shows, music performances, rock shows, drama shows, celebrity talk shows –, the list is endless. Of course, all the latest movies are on offer too, no matter which cinema hall or multiplex in your city they’re on.
BookMyShow E-Gift Voucher – A Perfect Gift for Everyone
Got a mom who loves classical music but never does anything about it? Have a friend who’s crazy about an international rock or pop band, but keeps missing their concerts in India? Gift them both bookmyshow gift cards along with details of the performance they want to watch. See how happy you’ve made your family and friends. Could you have achieved the same delight with some wallet or pen holder? We don’t think so.
expiry: 1 year from the date of activation
name: BookMyShow Instant Voucher
shortDescription:
•    Validity of the gift card is 12 months from the date of purchase

•    Multiple gift cards can be used in a single transaction.

•    Gift card balance cannot be used to purchase another gift card

Multiple gift cards can be used in a single transaction. Gift card balance cannot be used to purchase another gift card

tnc.content:
• Gift Voucher can be redeemed only on BookMyShow Website/Mobile App & cannot be redeemed directly at the Cinema/Venue Box Office.
  • Gift Voucher can be redeemed on the purchase of e-tickets for Movies/Virtual Events/Plays/Concerts/Sports/BMS Stream available on BookMyShow.
  • Multiple Gift Vouchers can be used in a single transaction or Gift Voucher can be combined with any other payment type on BookMyShow.
  • Gift Voucher can be used multiple times until the last rupee loaded on it gets exhausted within the validity period.
  • Gift voucher is valid for 6 months.
  • Gift Voucher cannot be used to purchase another Gift Card.
  • Gift Voucher work on non-extension clause & order once confirmed cannot be Cancelled or Refunded.
  • Gift Voucher are valid PAN India across all Cinemas/Partners associated with BookMyShow.
  • If lost misused, the Gift Voucher cannot be replaced. Void if resold, cannot be exchanged for points or cash & cannot be re-validated once past expiry date.
  • In addition to these Terms & Conditions, BookMyShow Gift Voucher & their use on our Website are also subject to BookMyShow's General Terms of Use & BookMyShow's decision will be final in case of any dispute.
  • BookMyShow Terms & Conditions Apply.


Gift Voucher Steps to Redeem:

  • Log on to in.bookmyshow.com or BookMyShow Mobile App.
  • Select Location, Event, Venue, Show Date, Time & Seats of your preference as the logic flows.
  • On payment page, click on the “ More Payment Options” & click on the "Gift Voucher" tab to enter the Gift Voucher e-code in the text box that appears & click on "Apply" button to avail the offer.
  • Note: At the end of the successful transaction, Booking ID gets generated which needs to be exchanged at the Cinema/Venue Box Office for actual tickets.
  • Email/SMS confirmation will be sent on the Email Address/Mobile Number provided while completing the transaction.

tnc.content:
How to redeem/How to use:

To use the IKEA gift card on the IKEA App

  1. Add products to your cart on the IKEA App
  2. Before purchasing GC, please ensure that IKEA delivers to your location
  3. To check, please follow these steps:https://bit.ly/4cam5Vg
  4. Alternatively, you can check your PIN code against this list: https://bit.ly/4aLjno1
  5. At check-out, select the payment method as “Gift card”
  6. Enter the gift card details, complete checkout.

To use IKEA gift card on the website:

  1. go to https://www.ikea.com/ add products to you cart
  2. Before purchasing GC, please ensure that IKEA delivers to your location
  3. To check, please follow these steps: https://www.ikea.com/
  4. Alternatively, you can check your PIN code against this list: https://bit.ly/4aLjno1
  5. Proceed to checkout, in the payment section, select Redeem an IKEA gift card
  6. Enter the gift card details, complete checkout.

To use the IKEA gift card in IKEA stores:

  1. Visit the outlet near you.
  2. At the billing counter inform cashier that you want to use Gift Card.
  3. Show your Gift Card details & pay any balance amount by cash or card.

 

Terms and Conditions:

  1. The Gift Card will be valid for 1 Year. The validity of the Gift Card cannot be extended.  No new/ replacement Gift Card will be provided in lieu of the expired Gift Card.
  2. Gift card can only be used in-store and on the IKEA website and IKEA Application for purchases.
  3. Before purchasing GC, please ensure that IKEA delivers to your location. To check, please follow these steps: https://bit.ly/4cam5Vg. Alternatively, you can check your PIN code against this list:https://bit.ly/4aLjno1
  4. Any unused balance in the Gift Card at the end of the one (1) year period will be forfeited. The Gift Card cannot be used to purchase other gift cards.  Value stored in a gift card cannot be transferred to another gift card.
  5. The gift card can be used multiple times till the balance is exhausted.
  6. The gift card (“Gift Card”) is issued by IKEA India Private Limited (“IKEA”) for use by its customers solely for the purchase of products [and services] at IKEA stores in India.  It must be returned to IKEA upon request.
  7. The bearer of the Gift Card is solely responsible for the safety of the Gift Card. IKEA will not be responsible for any acts of omission or commission if the Gift Card is stolen, lost or used without the permission of the person who purchased the Gift Card from IKEA.  IKEA can refuse to accept Gift Cards that are damaged or mutilated and cannot be used on a point-of-sale machine at the specified IKEA store.
  8. The Gift Card cannot be used for withdrawing cash. The Gift Card is non-negotiable.
  9. The difference in price of IKEA products purchased with the Gift Card and the total balance on the Gift Card will remain as unused balance. Subject to these terms and conditions, the customer may use the Gift Card multiple times until the balance amount has been spent.
  10. The amount in a Gift Card cannot be increased after purchase
  11. The Gift Card cannot be redeemed for cash or credit at the IKEA stores.
  12. IKEA reserves the right to cancel the Gift Card if it is found to be acquired fraudulently. In such cases, IKEA will credit the funds back to the same source from where the funds were received.
  13. The Gift Card cannot be cancelled by the purchaser after it is purchased. Any cancellations will be at the sole discretion of IKEA.
  14. These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. The parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts at Bangalore, India. The purchase of the Gift Card is subject to fulfilment of Know-Your-Customer (“KYC”) requirements stipulated by the Reserve Bank of India, the Government of India and other statutory authorities from time to time. The purchaser agrees to indemnify IKEA for all claims brought by a third party against IKEA and/or its affiliates arising out of or in connection with a breach of any of these terms and conditions.
  15. IKEA does not make any warranties, express or implied, with respect to the Gift Cards, including, without any limitation, any express or implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose
  16. IKEA reserves the right to change these Gift Card terms and conditions from time to time at its discretion and without any prior notice to you. All the terms and conditions are applicable to the extent permitted by the laws of the Republic of India.

cpg.howToUse:
Steps to link your PhonePe Gift Card to your PhonePe account
Once you buy or receive a PhonePe Gift Card, link it with your PhonePe account via My Profile> All payment methods> PhonePe Gift
Card> Claim now.
Enter the gift card number and PIN to add the Gift Card to your balance.
Steps to pay using your PhonePe Gift Card
If you have linked Gift Card balance in your account, the Gift Card balance will be automatically made available for payments towards eligible merchant transactions.
Gift Card balance is selected as a default mode for making the payment, you may choose to deselect this option if you do not wish to pay via Gift Card for a particular transaction.
In cases where you may have multiple Gift Cards linked to your account, PhonePe automatically picks the Gift Card balance which will expire the soonest.

tnc.content:
These terms and conditions apply to the Amazon Prime Voucher issued by Pine Labs Private Limited (Pine Labs) under the brand name of Qwikcilver and co-branded with Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited ("Voucher").

  1. An Amazon Prime Voucher is a prepaid payment instrument that can be used to purchase Amazon Prime memberships (3-months, 12-months, Prime Shopping edition or Prime Lite plan) or Amazon Pay Anytime Gift cards (inactive zero value gift card) from Amazon.in. An Amazon Prime Voucher has an expiry of 12 months from the date of activation, subject to applicable terms. An Amazon Prime Voucher cannot be transferred or cancelled once it is issued (please reach out to the issuer (Pine Labs) for any assistance in this regard). Additionally, as per Amazon business guidelines, Amazon Prime Vouchers cannot be claimed on Amazon Business accounts.

  2. The Prime Lite membership plan provides customers access to: FREE unlimited Same-day/1-day delivery, access to HD quality movies & shows on Prime Video on one device of choice (mobile/TV), early access to shopping events, unlimited 5% cashback with Amazon Pay ICICI credit card, unlimited 5% cashback on all Uber rides with Amazon pay balance. Prime Lite does not include access to ad-free & 4K UHD Prime Video, Prime Music, Prime Reading & Prime Gaming. Know more.

  3. Credit and Debit Cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase Amazon Prime Voucher.

  4. Amazon Prime Voucher cannot be used to purchase any other physical or digital product on Amazon.in including but not limited to: (i) products on 'Global Store' on Amazon.in, recharges, all kinds of bill payments, all kinds of ticket bookings and financial products on Amazon.in. (ii) purchase Amazon Pay gift cards (pre-loaded) on Amazon.in (iii) pay for mixed item order if the order has at least one non-eligible item.

  5. Amazon Prime Voucher cannot be used to purchase Prime membership plans if customer has telecom provider (Airtel, VI, Jio etc.) activated Prime membership on the same Amazon account.

  6. Existing Amazon Prime members who purchased Amazon Prime/Prime Lite membership via Google Play are not eligible to redeem Amazon Prime Voucher for extending/upgrading the Amazon Prime membership.

  7. Beneficiary of the Amazon Prime Voucher can apply the 13-digit numeric code on https://www.amazon.in/vouchers and add the voucher balance in his/her Amazon.in account.

  8. Customers can add a maximum balance of INR 1799/- to their Amazon Prime voucher balance.

  9. Amazon Prime Voucher can be claimed/redeemed only once per customer

  10. Amazon Prime membership activated via Amazon Prime voucher can't be cancelled and is non- refundable.

  11. Amazon Prime Voucher cannot be transferred for value or redeemed for the cash.

  12. Pine Labs, Amazon, or their affiliates are not responsible if a voucher is lost, stolen, destroyed, or used without permission.

  13. Amazon.in logo/trademark is an IP of Amazon or its affiliates and the Pine Labs trademark/logo is an IP of Pine Labs.

  14. Pine Labs reserves the right to change these Voucher terms and conditions from time to time in its discretion and without prior notice to you. All terms and conditions are applicable to the extent permitted by law.

  15. For detailed terms & conditions and frequently asked questions, please click here.

    1. The Gift Card shall be valid for a fixed period of twelve (12) months from the date of purchase (irrespective of when it is received, activated or redeemed).

  • Loss, Theft, or Misuse

  • Product and Service Availability

    1. The Company reserves the right to reject, block, or cancel any Gift Card it deems fraudulent, suspicious or appears to be obtained through unauthorized or illegitimate means. The Company shall have the right to reject any claim in the event the Company becomes aware or is of the opinion that fraud or illegal means are used to take benefit of the Gift Card.

    3. The User agrees and understands that the Company shall be the sole and final authority on the interpretation of these Terms.

In no event and circumstances shall the Company be liable for any loss, damage, claim, any loss of revenue, profits of any kind in connection with the Gift Cards, even if it has been advised of the possibility of such damage. Further, in no event shall the Company’s liability in relation to a Gift Card, whether in contract, tort, or otherwise, exceed the monetary value of the Gift Card as of the date of the claim.
  • Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
    1. These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.
    2. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with the Gift Card shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Bengaluru, Karnataka.

These Terms are in addition to and do not override the Company’s terms and conditions available at https://www.rentomojo.com/terms-and-conditions, privacy policy available at https://www.rentomojo.com/privacy-policy and any other policies, all of which are deemed to be incorporated herein by reference.

    3. The Gift Card holder agrees to indemnify and hold the Company harmless from and against any claim, demand, cause of action or loss or liability (including, but not limited to, attorneys’ fees and costs) arising from any misuse or unauthorized use of the Gift Card.
  • Cancellation of Orders
    1. In case of cancellation of Orders made using the Gift Cards within the validity period, the amount will be reversed to the same Gift Card as used at the time of placing the order.

cpg.howToUse:
HOW DO I REDEEM A STEAM WALLET CODE?
Go to https://store.steampowered.com/account/redeemwalletcode and sign in if you aren't already. You will need to create a Steam account if you do not already have one.
Once logged into Steam, click on your username at the top-right corner and select "Account details."
Click "Add funds to your Steam Wallet" and then "Redeem a Steam Gift Card or Wallet Code."
Type in the code from your gift card and click "Continue."
Follow the instructions to add the funds to your Steam Wallet.
Note: If you have never used Steam Wallet credit on your account, you may be prompted to enter your current address to determine the correct currency.
The value of the Steam Wallet code will be added to your account's Steam Wallet balance. The current available balance will be listed in the upper right-hand corner below your profile.

description:
UniPin is the leading digital entertainment enabler specialising in distribution of gaming top-ups and vouchers.
UniPin Vouchers can be used to top-up your favourite games and purchase your favourite vouchers on www.unipin.com
expiry: 1 year from the date of activation
name: Unipin E-Gift Voucher

tnc.content:
UniPin Voucher- Terms of service Eligibility and Redemption. UniPin Voucher (“UV”) is a prepaid/ gift card issued in India, valid only for users who are residents of India and making a purchase from unipin.com/India. UV are issued by UniPin (India) Private Limited (“UIPL”)
  • Redemption
    1. Direct top up to game with UV
      • To redeem a UV through direct top up, you will need access to the internet, visit www.UniPin.com and choose a game to top up or a game voucher to purchase
      • A user can only top-up games available in India using the UV
      • Next choose desired denomination that has the same value with your UV value and select "Physical Voucher", and then select "UniPin Voucher”.
      • Insert UniPin Voucher Serial and PIN, then select "Confirm" to complete the transaction.
      • UV can be reloaded into your game account while game voucher will be sent to your email
    2. Redeem game voucher from UniPin game account with UV
      • User has to be a UniPin registered user to redeem UV into his/her UniPin game account
      • Login to UniPin game account at www.UniPin.com
      • Click Top Up and select reload with UV
      • Insert UniPin Voucher Serial and PIN, then select "Confirm" to complete the transaction
      • UV will be reloaded into your UniPin game account and you can now use it to purchase your desired game codes or game voucher
Limitations. Each UV can only be redeemed once. Any unutilised balance will be forfeited post expiry or redemption. The UV is not redeemable for cash or other cards, is not reloadable or refundable, cannot be combined with other UV nor other payment instruments, and cannot be resold, exchanged or transferred for value, except as permitted by the applicable law. Once a UV is purchased, the risk of loss and title for the UV passes to the purchaser. UIPL disclaims all express or implied warranties as to the UV and www.unipin.com. UIPL has the sole discretion to change the terms and conditions of the UV subjected to the applicable law.
Fees or Expiration. No fees shall apply to this UV. UV has a validity period of 12 months from the date of purchase.
Fraud. UIPL is not responsible in the event a UV is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without your permission. UIPL shall have the absolute right to suspend or terminate the customer accounts and bill alternative forms of payment if a UV used to make purchases on www.unipin.com.has been obtained fraudulently.
Online Assistance and Customer Care. For online assistance with a UV issue, please visit https://www.unipin.com/support OR email CS.in@unipin.com
Limitation of Liability. UIPL shall not liable in the event your UV is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without your permission. UIPL makes no express or implied warranties, including warranties of satisfactory quality, merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose, on the UV except those imposed by law. In the event a UV is non-functional due to a technical problem, UIPL will exchange the UV with the same amount of balance as per the non-functioning UV. UIPL shall not be liable in the event the UV does not perform in the manner as described in these terms of service which are caused by a third party such as internet disruption caused by (i)malfunction of a computer, mobile or other device used to access the internet, or (ii) an internet service or mobile network provider.
General Terms. These terms incorporate and are subjected to the UniPin Terms of Service. Use of the services described herein are further subject to the terms of service under the UniPin Privacy Policy When you purchase, receive or redeem a UV, you agree that the laws of the Republic of India shall apply, without regard to principles of conflict of laws, and that such laws will govern these UV terms of service. For any complaint, you agree to contact Customer Care first and allow UIPL to try to resolve the complaint prior to taking any other action. UIPL reserves the right to change these terms of service from time to time at its sole discretion to the extent as permitted by law.

description: Started as an air ticketing agency, DPauls has now grown and expanded into one of leading India’s tour and travel companies. It offers Domestic Holiday and Honeymoon Packages that are carefully custom-curated to help discover and take a peek into the most beautiful and interesting places across India and experience them closely. DPauls also offers packages for international holiday destinations such as Thailand, Dubai, Nepal, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, and more to create everlasting memories. Besides, it is also the perfect platform to book hotels, flight tickets, buses, airport transfers, and more. Do you wish to escape to the most beautiful places filled with natural beauty in India or abroad? Do you want to create the most fascinating moments with your spouse? Or, are you planning to reward and incentivize your corporate employees to make them feel recognized and valued?Buy DPauls Gift Cards and gift the most memorable moments to yourself, your loved ones, or your employees. Gifting a Holiday Package is the best gesture to make them laugh in joy and delight and feel special and valued.
expiry: 11 Months Days from the date of activation
name: Dpauls E-Gift Voucher
shortDescription:
•    You can redeem only 1 Gift Card for Flight Booking.

•    You can redeem a maximum of 3 Gift Cards for Package/Holiday Bookings.

•    Gift Card is for one-time use only.

•    Gift Cards can be used online only at the website.

tnc.content:
DPauls E-Gift Cards ("Gift Cards") are issued by DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd and powered by Valuedesign.
The Gift Card is valid only for buying DPauls Services on DPauls.com or by visiting DPauls Office located at B-40, Shivalik, Malviya Nagar, New Delhi-110017.
Once the Card is issued, it will be valid for 11 months.
Users are required to save the gift card number and PIN to utilize this refunded amount as we will not be able to reset the PIN or reissue a new gift card number.
Once purchased, Gift Cards cannot be cancelled, unless expressly allowed to do so by DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd.
This Gift Card cannot be clubbed with any other offer currently live on https://dpauls.com including cashbacks, discounts, etc. on a particular credit/debit card.
For Flight Booking, Only One Gift Cards can be used against One Bill .
For Package Booking for Holiday Packages, Upto 3 Gift Cards can be clubbed in Single Invoice.
It is the responsibility of the customer to ensure the safety of the Gift Card after purchase. DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. is not responsible if the Gift Card is lost, stolen, or used without permission. A Gift Card once issued cannot be re-issued nor can the PIN be reset.
The Gift Card cannot be replaced, refunded, revalidated, or exchanged for cash.
DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. reserves the right to deny accepting any Gift Card if it suspects that there is the duplicity of the Gift Card.
Products and services offered by DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. are subject to availability and terms of use of the DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. platform.
In no event, the liability of DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. for any claims arising by the purchase or usage of Gift Cards shall exceed the value of the respective Gift Card.
You shall be responsible for maintaining strict confidentiality of the Gift Card PIN/ Gift Card unique 16-digit number issued to you. DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. shall not be responsible to provide you with new Gift Cards in the event this confidentiality obligation is breached by you. Any misuse/unauthorized disclosure of Gift Cards shall result in cancellation of the order, as applicable, without any liability of DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd..
You agree to indemnify DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd./its affiliates, officers, and directors, from all claims brought by any third party against DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd./ its affiliates, officers, and directors, arising out of or in connection with any breach of these gift card terms and conditions.
In addition to the terms of use available on the DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. platform, you shall also abide by these terms and conditions specifically to be able to use the Gift Cards. In the event of any dispute in the interpretation of these terms, DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd. shall be the final authority on the interpretation of these rules.
This is for individual use only. Distributor found using Gift Cards would lead to cancellation of the booking and no refund would be made.
Disputes are subject to Delhi jurisdiction.
Credit and Debit Cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase DPauls Gift Card.
Gift Cards cannot be redeemed for Cash or Credit.
In the event that the beneficiary/Know Your Customer ("KYC") details are found to be incorrect or insufficient as per RBI Guidelines, DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd./ Valuedesign retains the right to cancel the Gift Card issued.
You agree and understand that Gift Cards are a pre-paid payment instrument subjected to regulations issued by the RBI under the RBI guidelines. DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd./ Valuedesign may be required to share KYC details of the purchaser/ redeemer of the Gift Card and/or any other information in relation to the purchase of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Card with RBI or such statutory authorities. DPauls Travel & Tours Ltd./ Valuedesign may contact the purchaser/redeemer of the Gift Card for any such information.
Gift Cards cannot be resold.
Gift card validity cannot be extended under any circumstances.
For any customer grievances, please call us on 011 66211111/ 011 66777111.
In case of any cancellation of orders purchased using Gift Cards within the validity period, the amount will be reversed to the Gift Card used at the time of shopping.
In case the Gift Card validity has expired, then there will be no refund processed for the amount paid by the Gift Card.

• Choose & finalize your preferred services (Flight/ Hotel/ Packages, etc) that you want to buy.
• Choose the E-Gift Card option during the payment process and make the payment to buy the service.

description:
Zomato’s platform connects customers, restaurant partners and 
delivery partners, serving their multiple needs. Customers use our 
platform to search and discover restaurants, read and write customer 
generated reviews and view and upload photos, order food delivery, 
book a table and make payments while dining-out at restaurants. On 
the other hand, we provide restaurant partners with industry-specific 
marketing tools which enable them to engage and acquire customers 
to grow their business while also providing a reliable and efficient last 
mile delivery service.

shortDescription: Zomato E-Gift Voucher

tnc.content:
Zomato gift cards (each a “Gift Card”) are issued by Pinelabs Private Limited (“Pinelabs”), a private limited company incorporated under the laws of India, and is authorized by the Reserve Bank of India ('RBI') under the Master Directions on Prepaid Payment Instruments (“PPI Master Directions”) to issue gift cards with Zomato Limited (“Zomato”) as the co-branding partner.
By purchasing the Gift Card on the Zomato Platform (as defined below), using or redeeming a Gift Card, the User is agreeing to accept and to be bound by these terms and conditions, as updated or modified from time to time.
The Gift Card bears a 16-digit electronic PPI number along with a 6-digit pin.
The Gift Cards can be redeemed towards the purchase of eligible products only on the Zomato website and mobile application (“Zomato Platform”).
Once the Gift Card is purchased, the User cannot cancel it, return it, seek a refund for it or redeem the Gift Card for cash or credit, except where required by applicable laws.
As a pre-requisite to redeeming the Gift Card, the User will be required to add the value stored on this Gift Card into their valid account on the Zomato Platform ("Zomato Account"). The loading of the Gift Card onto the Zomato Platform shall constitute a registration of the User with Pinelabs.
The balance in the Zomato Account shall be deducted when the User makes purchases on the Platform.
The Gift Card can be combined with promotional codes and with other digital payment options, at Zomato’s or its affiliate’s discretion.
The Gift Card cannot be used to purchase other gift cards.
The Gift Card cannot be reloaded or redeemed for cash.
The unused Gift Card balances associated with a Zomato Account cannot be transferred to another Zomato Account.
The Gift Cards may only be purchased in denominations ranging from INR 100 to INR 10,000, or such other limits as Pinelabs/Zomato may determine.
In case of multiple Gift Cards being loaded to a User’s Zomato Account, the Gift Cards having the earliest expiration date will be applied to the User’s purchases on the Platform first.
There is no fee or other charges associated with the Gift Card purchase on the Zomato Platform.
No interest will be payable by Pinelabs on any Gift Card or Gift Card balance.
The Gift Card is valid for a period of 1 (one) year.
The Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. However, there may be delays in the system upto seventy-two (72) hours.
Credit and debit cards issued outside India cannot be used to purchase a Gift Card.
Gift Card usage information shall be available on Zomato Platform to the User.
While redeeming the Gift Cards, if the User’s purchase on the Zomato Platform exceeds the balance in the User Zomato Account, the remaining amount must be paid by the User through credit card, net banking, debit card or other digital payment methods available on thePlatform.
The User agrees and understands that the Gift Card is a prepaid payment instrument regulated by the RBI. Under the applicable laws, Zomato / Pinelabs may be required to share the details of the Gift Card purchaser/ redeemer and/or any other information in relation to the redemption of the Gift Cards and/or transaction undertaken using the Gift Cards, with RBI or other governmental/ statutory authorities. Zomato/ Pinelabs may contact the purchaser/ redeemer (as the case may be) of the Gift Cards for any such information. By registering the Zomato Gift Cards, the User explicitly gives their permission for the usage of their personal information to comply with RBI guidelines and regulations.
The User agrees to provide truthful and accurate information during the purchase of Gift Cards. Zomato may contact the User for further information and documents from the User to comply with KYC and anti-money laundering guidelines issued by RBI from time to time.
Zomato reserves the right to change the Gift Cards terms and conditions from time to time at its discretion and without prior notice to the User.
If the Gift Card is non-functional, the User’s sole remedy (and Pinelabs/ Zomato’s sole potential liability) shall be the replacement of such Gift Card, for the value remaining in the non-functional Gift Card.
Zomato shall consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from Users who have registered in accordance with the terms above.
Any cancellations shall be at the sole discretion of Zomato.
Zomato reserves the right to deny accepting any Gift Card if it suspects that there is duplicity of Gift Card.
Zomato reserves the right to void the Gift Card, close customer accounts and take payment from alternative forms of payment if (a) a fraudulently or unlawfully obtained Gift Card is redeemed and/or used to make purchases on the Zomato Platform, and/or (b) the beneficiary/KYC details as per RBI guidelines are found to be incorrect/insufficient. In such cases, the funds shall be credited back to the same source from where these were received from.
Fraudulent/unlawful/misuse of Gift Card shall result in cancellation of order, which has been made using the Gift Card without any liability of Zomato.
In case of any cancellation of orders purchased using Gift Cards, the amount will be added to the User’s Gift Cards balance.
The User is solely responsible for the safety and security of the Gift Card. Further, once the Gift Card has been sent to the User, the User is bound to protect the Gift Card’s 16 digit code and 6 digit PIN as the same constitutes confidential information. Zomato/Pinelabs shall not be responsible to provide new Gift Cards in the event (a) this confidentiality obligation is breached by the User, or (b) Gift Card is lost, stolen or used without permission or unlawfully.
User agrees to indemnify Zomato/ its Affiliate, officers, directors, from all claims brought by any third party against Zomato/ its affiliates, officers, directors, arising out of or in connection with any breach of these Terms.
Zomato does not warrant that the services and products provided to the User pursuant to these terms and conditions will be free of interruptions, errors, bugs, viruses, or security problems.
Neither Pinelabs nor Zomato makes any warranties, express or implied, with respect to Gift Cars including without limitation, any express or implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.
Zomato makes no representation or warranty that the Platform will always be accessible without interruption.
In no event shall the liability of Zomato for any claims arising by the purchase or usage of Gift Cards exceed the value of the respective Gift Card.
The User may write to giftcards@zomato.com for any support with regards to usage of the Gift Cards.
Pinelabs contact Information. customer support: 080-64534440 | Email: gcsupport.woohoo@pinelabs.com Website address: www.pinelabs.com
Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.pinelabs.com/grievance-policy
The courts at New Delhi shall have exclusive jurisdiction for any disputes arising in relation to Gift Cards.

cpg.howToUse:
•    The cards can be redeemed at Taj, Vivanta or Gateway hotels in India for all valid spends at that hotel and at Taj Reservations Worldwide for prepaid room reservations. This does not include Ginger Hotels.

•    For prepaid room reservations at Taj Reservations Worldwide the card number and PIN must be quoted when making the reservation

•    A valid card in its original form or e-mail must be presented at the time of availing a service.

description:
Seeking the perfect gift? How about an extraordinary moment.

Would you rather gift a refreshing staycation, an intimate candlelight dinner, or a rejuvenating massage, to a close one? 
Now you don’t have to choose. 

Introducing Taj Experiences – our new gift card.
Through this card, your privileged recipient can enjoy stays, dining, spa appointments, and many more indulgences at any Taj Hotel in India. They’ll always remember the experience, and the person who made it possible
expiry: 365 days from the date of issue
name: Taj Hotels E-Gift Card
shortDescription:
•    To check balance and validity, visit www.tajhotels.com/giftcards and enter the Card Number and PIN.

•    TEGC may be redeemed for rooms, food and beverages, spa services, and taxes at Taj, SeleQtions, Vivanta hotels, and Ama Trails & Stays in India.

•    This excludes Retail outlets, business center equipment hire, third-party services, Banquets, conferences, and personal expenses (e.g., medicines) and payments at Ginger Hotels.

•    TEGC cannot be used for bills under Friends and Family and Special Employee Benefit offers.

tnc.content:
Taj Experiences Gift Cards which includes Taj Experience eGift cards (herein after referred to as “TEGC”) are issued by The Indian Hotels Company Limited, hereinafter referred to as Taj / The Company.
TEGC can be purchased for a minimum value of ₹1,000 and maximum value of ₹25000 per transaction.
To check balance and validity, please visit www.tajhotels.com/giftcards and input the Card Number and PIN in the ‘Check Balance’ section.
TEGC balance may be redeemed for spends towards rooms, food and beverages, spa and other services and applicable taxes without restrictions at Taj, SeleQtions and Vivanta hotels and Ama Trails & Stays in India, except for retail spends at third-party outlets, business centre equipment hire, hired services from third party sources, expenses on banquets, conferences, and events, or expenses of a personal nature for which a pay-out is raised such as buying medicines, repairs of personal items, etc. and payment for any membership program. This does not include Ginger Hotels. NeuPass: NeuCoins, TAP Points, TAPPMe Points will not be earned on charges which are paid using TEGC. TEGC cannot be used for settling the bills for stays on the Friends and Family and Special Employee Benefit offers.
TEGC can be redeemed for all valid spends at the aforesaid hotels and at Taj Reservations Worldwide for prepaid room reservations for hotels in India.
TEGC are valid for 365 days from the date of issuance. Valid TEGCs can be reloaded till their expiry date on www.tajhotels.com/giftcards, till a maximum card balance of ₹25000. TEGC would be automatically revalidated for 365 days from the date of load or reload. Revalidation requests would not be processed outside these terms.
Multiple transactions can be performed on the TEGC until the value of the TEGC is exhausted.
Should your purchase value exceed the balance on TEGC, the differential amount of such purchase may be loaded on the TEGC or paid at the point of sale in cash or through an accepted credit or debit card, at the time of making such purchase.
A valid TEGC in its original form or e-mail must be presented at the time of availing a service.
For prepaid room reservations at Taj Reservations Worldwide the card number and PIN must be quoted when making the reservation. The entire amount must be paid via the card to secure the reservation. In case the card balance is less than the due amount, the card may be reloaded on www.tajhotels.com/giftcards before processing the reservation. Standard cancellation policies would apply. Please contact Taj Reservations Worldwide to process any eligible refunds from cancellations on your Card.
TEGC shall not be valid for use at any other service establishment or for withdrawal of cash.
No refund, replacement or cash back would be considered against the TEGC. Once a TEGC is issued, the company will not entertain any request for cancellation. Any defaced, torn, altered, spoiled or cancelled card is deemed invalid and shall not be accepted.
TEGC are cash equivalent bearer cards. The company is not responsible for lost or stolen cards and will not replace the same.
Sale or trade of TEGC is strictly prohibited by any third party or platform, except by authorized sellers as per the list below. 

Woohoo

Freedeem

Indian Cashback

Amazon

Coupondunia

RedGirraffe

Paytm

Samsung Pay

Flipkart Market Place

Snapdeal

Magic Pin

Ola Money

Nearbuy

BSNL

Airtel Payments

Freecharge

PhonePe

Intermiles

Paisawapas

Gyftr
  •  Persons purchasing TEGCs or similar products from an unauthorized seller or platform do so at their own risk and consequences; Taj shall not be responsible or liable in respect of any claims or loss/damage caused to any person in any manner whatsoever in relation to TEGC or similar products purchased from such unauthorized sellers or platforms. In case of query, please call Taj Reservations Worldwide at 1800-111-825 or +91-22-6601-1825 or e-mail reservations@tajhotels.com 

Redemption of the TEGC by its bearer shall be valid discharge of the company's liabilities in respect of the TEGC.
Any dispute needs to be referred to The Indian Hotels Company Limited and the decision of the company shall be final.
Any further dispute related to the card shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts at Mumbai.
The TEGC is subject to applicable laws. The company, purchaser and the card bearer shall comply with all applicable laws promulgated by any statutory/judicial/competent authority from time to time in this regard.
The company reserves the right to amend these terms and conditions from time to time.
Any change in these terms and conditions can be viewed on our website.
For any other queries, please call Taj Reservations Worldwide at 1800-111-825 or

+91-22-6601-1825 or e-mail reservations@tajhotels.com

description: Gift nothing but the best with Giftwrapped by Oberoi. Whether it’s a weekend in the Himalayas, a meal by one of our award winning chefs or an authentic Balinese spa experience, the Giftwrapped by Oberoi Gift Card is the perfect way to express your love.
expiry: 12 months from the date of issue
name: Oberoi Hotels & Resort Gift Card

tnc.content:
Oberoi Hotels & Resorts Gift Card is issued by Pine Labs Private Limited under the brand name of Qwikcilver.
Valid Gift Card in its original form has to be presented at the time of availing a service.
Multiple transactions can be performed on a Gift Card until the value of the card is exhausted.
Gift Card may be used only at participating Oberoi Hotels & Resorts and Trident Hotels in India.
All Gift Cards issued after January 01, 2018 shall have a minimum validity period of 1 (one) year from the date of last loading / reloading of the Gift Card.
The company purchasing the Gift Card shall, at all times, keep the passwords that are created by the company or its customers/beneficiaries on the Website and the Gift Card Pin generated strictly confidential and not reveal the same to any person or entity.
This Gift Card cannot be transferred for balance value or redeemed for cash.
This Gift Card is cash equivalent. Pine Labs, Oberoi Hotels & Resorts or their affiliates are not responsible if this Gift Card is lost, stolen or destroyed or used without permission.
No refund, replacement or cash back would be considered against the Gift Card.
The Gift Card cannot be used for deposit, advance purchase or to secure or confirm a reservation.
Any defaced, spoiled or cancelled physical Gift Card is termed invalid and shall not be accepted.
Any dispute shall be referred to Oberoi Hotels & Resorts and the decision of Oberoi Hotels & Resorts will be final.
Subject to the foregoing, these terms and conditions shall be subject to the jurisdiction of courts at New Delhi, India.
Oberoi Hotels & Resorts reserves the entitlement to amend these terms and conditions from time to time. Any change in these terms and conditions can be viewed on our website.
Non-receipt of Gift Card post 7 days of receipt of dispatch confirmation has to be reported immediately or else Pine Labs, Oberoi Hotels & Resorts or their affiliates will not be liable for the misuse of the card.
If a guest purchases more than 50 cards or buys Gift Cards with value exceeding 2 Lacs or redeems in more than 100 transactions or redeems amount greater than 4 Lacs in a period of 30 days, Pine Labs will send a communication to these customers to check on the genuineness of the transaction.
No fees or charges apply to Gift Cards.
To register and activate your Giftwrapped by Oberoi Gift Card, please send a SMS from your mobile phone as follows: ACT16-Digit Card Number6 Digit Pin to 9717500167. The sending of the said message to the designated mobile number and receipt of due acknowledgement thereto, shall constitute registration of the User.
Oberoi Hotels & Resorts shall honour and consider requests for blocking of Gift Cards only from users who have registered in accordance with the terms above.
Please refer the Customer Grievance policy for dispute resolution, unauthorized transactions and liability related aspects at https://www.qwikcilver.com/grievance-policy/
The cardholder may request for the revalidation of the expired Gift Card. Upon receipt of such request the Gift Card may be revalidated after due verification and maybe subject to additional terms and conditions.

cpg.code: Croma QC Dealer eGift Card VAR

description: Croma is an Indian retail chain of consumer electronics and durables run by Infiniti Retail, a subsidiary of the Tata Digital
expiry: 365 Days from the date of activation
name: Croma E-Gift Card-QC Deal
shortDescription: Croma E-Gift Card-QC Deal

tnc.content:
The Electronic Gift Vouchers is issued by Croma, Infiniti Retail Ltd (the Company).
The Electronic Gift Vouchers can be redeemed on croma.com and at Croma Stores.
The validity period on the gift Vouchers is for 365 days from the date of its issuance or depends on the condition of the purchase.
Should your purchase value exceed the value of the Electronic Gift Vouchers, the differential amount of such purchase should be paid using the other modes of payment available on the website.
No refund, replacement or cash back would be considered against the Electronic Gift Vouchers.
This Voucher should be treated like cash. Electronic Gift Vouchers can't be replaced or duplicated, if lost or stolen.
Once Electronic Gift Vouchers are issued, the company will not entertain any request from anybody for its cancellation.
For any queries, balance check and date of expiry please contact any Croma store / check balance on www.croma.com or contact our Croma care at 186026627662 | 04046517910
In case of Returns/cancellations of the redemption done via EGV, the refund of the same will be done to the effect of the value of contribution of the EGV to the sale. The balance will be done via the contribution of the other respective payment mode to the sale. In the case of multiple products being purchased and a combination of the EGV and any other mode of payment being used to complete the transaction, the individual products being sold, will get the assignment of the value of the EGV and any other mode of payment being used based on the tender percentage contribution in total order value. The refund will happen in the same percentage split as per the original tender used.
The Electronic Gift Vouchers can be purchased Min Rs. 500 and Max 10,000.
The Electronic Gift Vouchers has to be utilized in one single transaction and the balance will not be carried forward for the same.
The Electronic Gift Vouchers cannot be reloaded.
Only 5 Croma EGV can be redeem on Single Invoice on Croma.com.
Redemption of Electronic Gift Vouchers by its bearer shall be valid discharge of the company's liabilities in respect of Electronic Gift Vouchers.
Any dispute need to be referred to the Company and the decision of the company shall be final.
The Electronic Gift Vouchers is subject to applicable laws. The company and Electronic Gift Vouchers holder shall comply with all applicable laws promulgated by any statutory / judicial / competent authority from time to time in this regards.
Any dispute relating to the Electronic Gift Vouchers shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts at Mumbai.
Infiniti Retail Ltd shall be entitled to amend these terms and conditions from time to time. Any change in these terms and conditions can be viewed on our Website and/or at any of the Croma stores.
Contact corporate@croma.com for any bulk enquires of Electronic Gift Vouchers.
